column1: text

Yummilicious And... yes, the scent is the best. if you like lemon frosting you won't be able to get enough of this lotion. but also, it's almost 100 natural, none of the yucky ingredients like in major brands of lotion. no mineral oil, no petroleum, etc. but also, it completely works. you know how sometimes you opt for organic choices and it's good, but not as good as popular but nastier brands jr watkins delivers. this lotion softens your hands and body, leaves you ungreasy and smells perfect. even my fiance likes it and uses it and he's pretty much anti-lotion in all regards. the price is absolutely right, too--get it!

One of my favorites The Hand-Cream-Lemon-Cream has such a refreshing fragrance. I wish it would last all day. It is soothing to the hands and I get compliments when I use it especially from my daughters and granddaughters, they want me to get some for them It is one of my favorite hand creams. I wish Watkins still had the vanilla body cream that too was a favorite.
Gave it a Try This cream did not do much for my face or throat area. I have gone back to my generic brand, it works better and is not as expensive. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
This product makes me feel young and fresh This product makes me feel young and fresh because it opens up my pores and it allows me to breathe with some sort of comfort.

bring back Coca I am in agreement with alot of your customers about the color Cocoa. OMG it was the absolute best and bought as many as i could find before it was gone....the best color and PLEASE bring it back or least tell us your not going to so we can find something else. I did find a Pink color (which is similar to Cocoa) in Organic Hemp and is my new replacement until you bring back Cocoa.

cocoa I recently have been to several stores looking for Bees cocoa. i rarely wear lip stick or anything on my lips. a couple yrs ago my sister got this for me and told me to try it, i was hooked, loved it. now i cant find it know where. then got on the computer, and found out its no longer available. omg please bring this back, its the only one i'll wear. thank you so much.

Beautiful!! I absolutely love this product! It had the consistency and the benefit of a lip balm, but the color of a lipstick. The frosty colors are beautiful. The slimness of the packaging is easy to carry and I love the peppermint scent. The only reason I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 is because I have a problem with getting the shimmer to crank back down into the tube. So I only twist out a very little at a time. I love the color Caramel.

Lip Shimmer I simply need to add my request to the others. PLEASE BRING BACK THE COLOR COCOA!!!!!!!! There will be a 5 rating if the color Cocoa - Lip Shimmer is brought back. I have looked and looked for something I like better but to no avail. I can't use the colors you currently have. They are to pale or to orange or to pink. I have been using lip shimmer for many years and had to stop because of the discontinued cocoa color.

Bring Back the Color Toffee I have been searching everywhere to find the Toffee color Lip Shimmer and couldn't find it so finally went to the website. Everyone I know is using it. I gave them out for Christmas presents a year ago and everyone loved the color as well and asking me where to get it. You would have quite a few orders for Toffee Lip Shimmer if you still had it in stock. Please, Please bring it back...Will you ever bring it back

Please bring Cocoa back! The only color I've worn for years is Cocoa--I didn't realize you discontinued it or I would have stock-piled it a long time ago! Now I'm down to a tiny bit left. I went on line today to order some since I haven't seen it in the stores--only to find out it doesn't exist anymore. I'm so sad. The other colors are too pink or too orange for me. Please consider bringing it back--I for sure will buy some!!

Kiss Me!!!! I like this lip shimmer. It does have color, so don't be fooled. Pick something that goes with your skin tone. I, as being part of the chocolate skinned community :D, bought Raisin. It is a wonderful color. It's a deep red, and it goes with my complexion very well. It has a nice mint 'zing' to it when you first out it on. I only wish that this would last longer that's why I gave it 4 stars.

Lip Shimmer in Assorted Colors - I own a few shades of the Lip Shimmer: Fig, Rhubarb, Apricot, and Peony. The formula is somewhere between a lip balm and a lipstick, and has a fairly strong bite of peppermint. The shimmer adds dimension and, in my opinion, is generally subtle enough for any age group to wear. Fig is a warm red-brown with hints of coral. I wouldn't say it looks awesome with my skin (fair with slight yellow undertones), so I apply lightly and don't try to build this one. Rhubarb is a bright, cool pinky-red. I do like how this shade looks with my skin however, it's rather bold so I wouldn't use this as an everyday shade. Apricot is a neutral peachy-coral ... like a nude, but with more kick. The color reminds me of the tinted lip balm in Hibiscus. It's a lovely shade when I want more oomph without looking too done-up. (Added note: Out of the four lip shimmers I've tried, this one was the least shimmery.) So far, this is my favorite of the bunch. Peony is a pale beige-mauve that leans a tad towards red with a near-frost finish and flecks of gold (if that all makes any sense - lol). It doesn't seem as pigmented as the other three. I find it similar to my natural lip color, just with a shimmery/frosty shine. The jury's still out on this one! Further experimentation is warranted. Staying power is about 2-3 hours max, which I feel is realistic considering it's a natural product. Even after the color wears off my lips still feel nice and moisturized. The small size of the tube is very convenient and doesn't take up much room in the purse. Conclusion: These lip shimmers are a nice step up from tinted lip balms without going right to lipstick. I look forward to trying more shades in the future!

sparkly! I am a long time user of Burt's Bees regular chapstick but I like a little color now and then. This is nice lip gloss as far as texture and scent. It could be a little more long lasting but I guess that would make it thicker, which I despise. I should try some of these newer colors, I like a very neutral color that accents my lip color not one that is vastly different from my own color.

Please bring cocoa back!!! I have been searching everywhere for my favorite lip shimmer and finally typed it into a google search to find out that it has been discontinued. I see that there are many other disappointed customers out there as well. I love that shade and I think it is safe to say that there are a great deal of others who feel the same way since we have all taken time to write these reviews. Please bring it back and make all of your customers happy!!! Thank you
Great product Very smooth - goes on easily, immediately absorbs into skin and never feels greasy. Keeps skin looking fresh and natural. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Please bring back cocoa! I adore your lip shimmers. I have been using them as my lipstick for years now, and my signature shade is cocoa. I get asked frequently what lipstick I use, and I get so many compliments on it. It is a beautiful color and it makes my lips feel great even in cold, winter weather. I am very disappointed to learn that you are discontinuing the shade cocoa. Please bring it back! I would give this product 5 stars if cocoa was still one of my choices.

It's a good lipbalm The color is awesome and the feeling in your lips is very good and it works as a moisturizing. It's really small, like half a pencil. I though for the picture that it was like a normal lipstick, that was kind of disappointing. It must be used like a chap stick not like a lipstick because it's almost impossible to put it back into the tube once you finish the application, that's really annoying when you first try it.

BRING BACK TOFFEE!!! Last time I could not find Toffee color in the stores, so I ordered 6 of them online, and now I am out again, but discovered I cannot order Toffee anymore. My girlfriend and I have always kept each other in the loop as to where we could get Toffee because she also loves it. I don't buy any other lip color except for Burt's. I also use Champagne, but Toffee is my favorite, as is many other people. Please consider bringing back this color!

Love Cocoa and Toffee! I agree with the other reviewers! I'm so sorry you've discontinued Cocoa and Toffee! I miss the gentle mint tingle on my lips but there are no other colors that compare. I bought out a Cocoa supply at a kiosk this summer and I used them all up. Cocoa is a great shade that looks great on any complexion. The lip shimmer would get 5 stars from me if I could use the new colors. I will be happy to order in bulk if Cocoa can be manufactured again!

Discontinued shade of lip shimmer Im sooooooo upset that the Cocoa color has been discontinued!!! It has been my favorite for years as well as several of my friends. I have tried the other colors and am not satisfied with the shades. Nothing even comes close. I love the shimmer, but now have to buy another competitors product to even come close. WHY WAS IT DISCONTINUED! I would have bought the entire remaining stock. Very upset about it. A girl and her lip color is a very important thing.

shiny shimmer ...:) i gotta the guava shimmer 4 days ago and applied it to my lips as soon as i bought it...it has a tingle effect on ur lips...oly con is it is not enogh hydrating!!..so i applied pomogranate lip balm over it....it was shimmery.... also i found another use for this shimmer is to use as a blush shimmer and a light stroke below the brows gives u a good natural eye highlighter!!! i love to use it as a blush...as it get absorbs better jus by my two fingers two times...VIOLA im done...SO 3 PURPOSES for this great shimmer!!!!!

da best I love that it has that tingly feeling of the beeswax lip balm and the moisture still. The colors are great but the color never matches the cap...... thats the only thing i personally don't like at all. But other than that i love burt's bees lip shimmer!!!! There is a color there for everyone. I found one for my mom and she is super tuff on lipsticks. I was misleaded on the website. I thought the lip shimmers were wayyyyy bigger than they really were..... but it works so well that i think it's worth it. And come on it natural and not tested on animals.

What happened to Raisin I know people who've been wearing it for years and now it's so hard to find. I have checked all major retailers, drugstores, etc. and even online. It must be discontinued because I've seen some high prices for it online. When I asked about it someone in the company claimed it hasn't been, but that does not seem to be true. I stopped using these and recently came back because it's a nice balm with good color payoff. Please bring back Raisin!

Pair with BB lip balm It feels great! I've been using BB lip shimmer since the first week it showed up on store shelves! If applied alone, the shimmer is gritty and leaves my lips feeling dry. That said, *the trick* is to use BB lip balm underneath the lip shimmer. I tried this and VOILA! the lip shimmer looks/feels fantastic. The color is noticeable without being overpowering in the least. While I wish I could just throw on the lip shimmer and go (I'm super low maintainance when it comes to cosmetics), I feel the extra step is worth it for the difference it makes in how my lips look/feel. This lip shimmer lasts well. On days when I care enough to seriously readjust my appearance during the workday, I'd say reapplying once in a 9a-5p workday (for a total of two applications) should be sufficient... if you're going out in the evening, maybe a third time. As an added bonus, Mr. TiaB loves the peppermint taste, given that many lip shimmer can taste like junk. Yum-- Kisses! -*) I was conflicted in rating this product, since it works so badly by itself but SO WELL when paired with the lip balm. (I decided to rate the shimmer on its own.)

Please don't discontinue darker colors I suffer from vitiligo, a condition where the skin becomes depigmented. It especially attacks areas of high pigment like the lips. A few years ago, my lips went white. I was using a commercial lipstick, but was not happy with how it dried my lips, when a friend recommended Burt's Bees with Color. I found my exact shade in Papaya and was ecstatic. Unfortunately, when I went to buy a new one, all the stores had were light colored shimmers. The darkest I could find was Peony, which barely tints my lips, which any lip balm can do. Fortunately for me, you still have Papaya on this site as a clearance item and I am buying several tubes, but I can't be the only one using your product not purely for cosmetic reasons. The light-colored frosts are not something I've ever liked, and from the other reviews I've seen, I'm not alone in wanting the darker colors back. I'm very happy with your product for how it treats my lips. Discontinuing colors is unfortunate. Is it so hard to keep a large stock of colors available Word is getting out about how good these are compared to lipstick. I know I've been spreading the word.
Regenerist Hydration Regenerist provides a deep hydration of the skin. I find my skin is smoother after use. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Overall Review I tried Rhubard Toffee since it was in the grab bag that I recieved from a friend. The Toffee is a little bit too brown for my lips but the Rhubard is nice and red. When I put on the Rhubard, it was brighter than than shown. As for the toffee it was more of a brown colored shade. You only need a little to make your lips red, so the stick will last a long time if used. It was also long lasting. The shimmer is more like a lipstick than a lip balm shimmer product. It is better than lipstick since it isn't heavy doesn't cake on and flake on later. It lasts pretty long, even when you wipe it off, my lips were still a bit tinted red from the Rhubarb color. Overall it's a great replacement for lipstick has a great range of colors. If you don't like a lipstick tint of color the radiance lip shimmer would be a better choice.

It's great I was afraid to try this because I thought something named shimmer would be too shimmery. It's not. This is a great lipstick alternative. For me, it's the right amount of color and gloss. The size also makes it very portable. I have three of these and I haven't had any issues with the way they've packaged. They do all smell like peppermint.

WHERE IS COCOA You have no idea how much money I have spent over MANY years on lipsicks that weren't right!! They look one color and when applied, a completely different color. Once I discovered Burt's Bees Lip Shimmer in COCOA, my life changed for the better, and my pocketbook was thicker!!! PLEASE BRING BACK COCOA!!!! Have a classic line as other cosmetics do when a product was eliminated and then brought back due to customer demand. I'm so happy to see so many others who share my opinion. You have nothing to lose and everything to gain...life-long, satisfied customers!!!! Please, please, please...bring back COCOA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Love it, but needs better descriptions I think I initially reviewed this product about a year ago. I was unhappy with the product because I was looking for a hint of color and shimmer, and got something more like a lipstick. After complaining to a friend about my disappointment, she let me try on her color. I have found that rhubarb goes on more like lipstick and it's color is quite strong. Peony, Nutmeg, and Caramel just add a hint of color. So, I guess you need to be careful which color you buy because some are more like lipstick. I absolutely LOVE the peony, nutmeg, and caramel. They add the perfect amount of color for my taste.

Love this, but please bring back Raisin I buy Lip Shimmer in bulk and always have some in my pants pocket. Since I do not carry a purse, it's petite form is perfect for me. It's a spot of color but moisturizing and so I use it mountain biking, skiing, etc. Although not rated for SPF, I have not gotten sunburned even in the Utah desert while wearing this product. I love this in Raisin, Fig, and Caramel. While I will settle for Fig, I am with those who would love to see you bring Raisin back. When I found out Raisin was being eliminated a couple years ago, I bought 20 or 30 tubes. Please bring Raisin back before I completely run out! Thank you.
Cocoa Lip Shimmer I love this color ordered 4 tubes last time. However, 2 of the tubes must have been turned up when filled because there was only a tiny amount in the tube.

My alternative to lipstick! I have always hated wearing lipstick because I felt like it made my lips dry out faster. With prom coming up last year I decided to try this out as I've absolutely loved their chapsticks. I really loved the caramel color, which looks nice and coppery. Felt good just like wearing their regular chapstick. I did come off kinda easy when I kissed my boyfriend (though if you wait a few minutes it doesn't come off as easily) and it won't last well through eating and drinking. But I'm fine with having to reapply it when it feels so much better than lipstick (looks prettier than many with that shimmery stuff). I do think there needs to be some more colors and shades, not everyone is a fan of the pinks and reds (my preference has always been the more orangey and coppery shades).

So sad! BRING BACK COCOA FIG! I have used Burts Lip Shimmer for YEARS and am so upset when I found out that Toffee wasn't to be found in any store I was devistated. I have been looking for Cocoa as well and low and behold decided to try the site only to find they are both discontinued!! How could this be Its an Outrage! I have received so many compliments on my lip color and don't use anything other than these two shades *sometimes champagne. Try others---WELL---I have tried Carmel, Peony, Ruhbarb, Fig, Rasin all of which don't look right on me! BRING THEM BACK PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Now I have to go shopping for something else to wear. Sadly you lost my business. Hopefully you will bring them back someday!
This Product Rocks Great colors does not cake or feather fantastic colors.
Mrs CoffeeCup says. Lipshimmer excellent. My wife states Lip Shimmer is great. great colors.
deep hydration regenerating cream I really like this product I feels good going on and makes a difference in your skin This review was collected as part of a promotion.
lip shimmer This is fabulous. I wear it every day and not lipstick.
Lip Shimmer Please don't get rid of the the Cocoa!!! LOVE IT!!!
Great in color. I love the shimmer of color and the moisturizer that it provides. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
My Favorite! It's the best non-lipstick lipstick color for everyday wear.
LOVE IT Wonderful product. So many choices and they all work wonderfully. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

best purchase ever this product is great even my mom liked it it is very good

nice It smells good it makes your lips feel soft, quality is good

LOVE LOVE LOVE Just a great (but simple) product - can't be without it!!
BRING BACK COCOA Cocoa is the only one that I like. Now I'll have to change products. Very sad.
Love the cocoa Great color. Long lasting and makes my lips so smooth. Great product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
I Miss Cocoa Please bring back Cocoa, it is my all time favorite Lip Shimmer color.
Excellent I have 4 colors and love them. They relieve chapped lips and give you color.

This stuff works I have been using this cream for a couple of years now and love it! I use it daily and love the way my skin feels after putting it on. I also like the scent. It is not over powering but subtle.. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Best Colors I absolutely love all the colors, peony is perfect for any skin tone.
COCOA IS BACK! Thank you, thank you for bringing cocoa back! It's the best color ever!!!
Great Purchase My second favorite after the lip crayon! Great for a spring/summer look! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Bring Back Cocoa! Wonderful product but bring back Cocoa! The other colors don't compare :(
Have to join the Cocoa lovers! Please please please bring back cocoa... it is the only color I can wear!

lost w/out cocoa Absolutely LOVE this product but need to come back with cocoa!!!
My favorite lip color I use this product all the time. I have replaced my lip stick with this.
Please bring back Cocoa!! Cocoa is the only shade that works on me! Please bring it back!

The best I have used Olay products since I was 16, now I am 66. I would not change for anything. Love them all. You keep getting better all the time. Keep sending me your updates. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Thank you thank you! Thank you times a million for bringing back cocoa lip shimmer!
PLEASE BRING BACK COCOA I LOVE cocoa and its the only color that works with my skin coloring.
best tasting lip balm I LOVE these lip balms. They are moisturizing, taste great, gives just a hint of color.
Bring back Cocoa!!! I love this color and I can't find it anymore! Please bring it back! Not Happy!:(

love this lip shimmer the colors are great love the tingle on your lips make them feel nice and soft.
Love the Shimmer I love this stuff! The shimmer is just enough for when you want a subtle shine.

soft and shiny great combo natural, soft, shimmery lips. love the option of different tints, too
Very soothing Great smell and feel. Does wonders to my skin. Very nourishing. Has a quality that intensive the moisture in my skin.
Good thing on my lip This is really a good thing that I would like to wear it whole day on my lip.
papaya please bring back papaya!!! You don't offer anything even close to that color... This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Cocoa I am beyond EXCITED that my color is back! Yayyyy for Cocoa lip shimmer!
Love it! This is a lip cosmetic staple I just cannot live without. Great Colors to boot!
The only lip color I use Great natural-looking color for those of us who use very minimal makeup.
Please bring Cocoa color back!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am in my 50's in this is the only color that looks good on my lips!!! Please, please, please!!!
Never leave home with out it! I never buy lipstick anymore. I love how this moisturizes and gives shimmer and color to my lips!
Please Please bring back Cocoa Bring back Cocoa. No other color compares to it. I cant find anything this nice anywhere!!

Love Burt's Bee's Lip Shimmers I miss two of my favorites - Nutmet and Papaya. Where can I find them or something close.

Great moisturizer. Really love how well this moisturizes my skin without feeling oily. I do wish it helped a little more with wrinkles/crows feet, but still love the product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Nutmeg PLEEEASE bring Nutmeg color back. It's a perfect color for those who are fair skinned!!
Great Look I have 3 different colors. i like the shimmer along with the slight tint. They wear well also.

great product Lip shimmer not only makes your lips look shiney and luscious, it gives them a little tingle!
Great! Makes my lips fill awesome! love the color tint as well! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Please bring back Cocoa :(Shimmer!!!!! I miss cocoa-it was my favorite now I have no lipstick. cocoa toffee are the best!!!!
Wonderful shades. I love these. the color lasts for hours after I put it on. Rhubarb is my favorite!
THANK YOU!!! THANK YOU!!! THANK YOU!!! Thank you SO MUCH for bringing back Cocoa!!!! Now my search for a replacement lip color can end!!!!!
Cocoa lip shimmer I am adding my support for the Cocoa lip shimmer. Please bring it back--there are no other colors like it.
My face love this My face soaks this up and is happy all day long. Very happy with this product. It's like aroma therapy for the skin
Please bring back cocoa Would appreciate it if you brought back the cocoa shade. Am dissatisfied that it was discontinued.
Nutmeg Please bring nutmeg back!!!!! This is the only color for I've skin and black hair that is natural.
Bring back Cocoa!! Please, please, please bring back cocoa!! i love this product and its the only color that works for me!!!
Bring Back Cocoa Lip Shimmer I agree with others - please bring back Cocoa Lip Shimmer. None of the current colors come close.
Bring Back Cocoa! The Cocoa Lip Shimmer is my all-time favorite color of any brand/shade I've tried. PLEASE bring it back!
Very nice! I have Rhubarb, and it's the perfect replacement for a sticky gloss. Very pretty, and very moisturizing.
Love It I love the lip shimmers because the colors are great and very moisturizing. I never use anything else.
exactly what i was looking for i had one color but was looking for something lighter for the spring/summer look and i found it.
Good Product Makes lips feel refreshed as it soothes dry, chapped lips. The color shades give lips a natural look.
nice I really like the fact that it just gives your lips a little sparkle with not much color. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

New formula is terrible I used (and loved) this product for several years until they changed it. It used to moisturize my skin and left it feeling soft. Now, it sits on top of my skin and is never absorbed. It just leaves a slimy film on my skin. I will no longer purchase this product.

I liked it I really did like this. It took a little longer for the results I had hoped for but I realize if you keep a good regiment it will work really well. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
BRING BACK TOFFEE PLEASE!!!!! I love the shimmers. Toffee was my favorite. I never wore anything else. Please bring it back!!!!!
use instead of lipstick I use this product instead of lipstick so I don't have to worry about what chemicals I am inadvertently swallowing.
Cocoa Lip Shimmer I am very happy Cocoa Lip Shimmer is back!! Love this color!! Thanks Burt's Bees for listening to your customers.
My Favorite I love Burt's Bee's Lip Shimmer. It is my favorite lip product ever. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Great feel, taste and shine Love this stuff. Feels like your wearing nothing at all yet it makes your lips super soft and silky. NEVER STICKY!
lovely color! Best purchase ever !....i don't feel guilty re applying as its 100 natural....keeps my lips hydrated and soft. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Better than lipstick While I may need to reapply this, my lips are invigorated and feel fresh every time I apply this. Great product!
Bring back Cocoa Cocoa was the only of it's color kind. Please bring it back, as none of the other colors work for me!! Thanks!!
It's the best! I have been using this for years. Love the colors. Sometimes I will layer it with other BB products. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
PLEASE bring cocoa back! Can you please bring cocoa back and I'll buy a case! I finally found a makeup color I love! Love this product!
This product works wonders I have used the product since I was 16 I have tried others just not the same.my mom used it how I learned about it
Good product The color (merlot) fits well with my lip. Moisture of shimmer is not good enough but I like the color.
Good Stuff I love this lip shimmer because it helps my lips from being chapped and cracked strawberry is my favorite one
Lip shimmer love. Loved this product and used it several times everyday. I would not leave the house without it in my pocket.
Fashionable! This Stuff works just as good as the beeswax lip balm and gives you a fashionable color to your lips!
PLEASE BRING COCOA BACK!!! This is THE perfect color- I have also been using this for years, and I have gotten so many compliments on it. I'lll buy tons!
Great chapstick I love this to reapply all throughout the day. It's light like a chapstick, yet just enough color to look like you tried ) This review was collected as part of a promotion.
So glad Cocoa is back!! I have used this particular color lip shimmer for the past 5 years. Absolutely love it!! So glad they brought Cocoa back!!
Shine On The best Lip Shimmer ever. Not greasy feeling. Soft and smooth. I chose to buy 4. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Want MERLOT back! I love this product, but the very best color for me is MERLOT and it isn't available anymore. PLEASE BRING BACK MERLOT!
refreshing This product is great for someone who wants more color than with the gloss. It has a refreshing peppermint smell and flavor.

Hydrating and pleasant fragrance This product has recently changed its formula. I have been using the old formula for years and probably prefer that formula over the new one but it is still too early to judge for certain. I definitely prefer the white dispenser top over the new black one since the residue looks very unappealing on a black surface. Does not look clean which is what you would want your facial products to represent. Overall I still like this product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Coffee Please bring back coffee color. Love your product, but will not buy any more until coffee comes back. The best color ever!!!
Great product. I love how you get great color and good coverage. I would recommend this to everyone. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Wonderful colors I love the colors in this collection. I also love the tingly feeling these leave on my lips! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
OMG! Where's Cocoa! I've been using Lip Shimmer in Cocoa as long as I can remember! My only comment is PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE bring Cocoa back!
Where did the Papaya go! I've been using the Papaya lip shimmer for years and now it's gone.......... Haven't found another color that I like. Darn!
Nice I like this product. I think the different colors are really nice and it really keeps my lips moisturized and soft.
A great product This is a great everyday lip color. More color than a gloss but nice and shiny. Great with the peppermint cooling flavor.
Great sheer Love that the color is there, but not too thick. Nice and sheer. And moisturizing! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Bring Back Cocoa! I've been desperately looking for cocoa at every retailer for months! So sad to come here find it's been discontinued!

Olay moisturizer I have used Oil of Olay off and on, but I always go back to Olay. I use everyday under my make-up and many times as a night time moisturizer. My skin looks smooth and I have very few wrinkles or lines.

Love the tingle I love the tingle and my favorite colous are Watermelon and Caramel. I have ordered others to check them out. I also was wondering if you would make this format for men but with now shimmer or colour. The tingle feels great on the lips but men don't like the sparkle.

Cocoa is delicious! I love the Lip Shimmer product, and have a couple colors, but, I too, along with many other Shimmer lovers, wish you'd bring Cocoa back. Its dark and delicious. Please consider bringing it back, or treat us to a new shade of brown. Love it and miss it! Cheers, Cookie

OMG - Cocoa!!!!! Thank you - Thank you- Thank you - My Color is back and I am so excited!!!! I have used this color for years and was getting down to my last 2 tubes. I used to look at the stock in every store just hoping to find some more....I don't need to look anymore - yippee!!!!

Bring Back Cocoa I love your product and have been buying cocoa lip shimmer. Unfortunately I have not been able to find it recently. I have tried other shades but have not found a shade that I like as well as cocoa. Is there a chance that you will bring this back in the near future.

COCOA LIP SHIMMER PLEASE PLEASE BRING BACK COCOA LIP SHIMMER, I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANYTHING THAT COMPARES TO THIS PRODUCT. YOUR OTHER COLORS ARE FINE TOO BUT I USED COCOA EVERYDAY FOR YEARS.. FROM ALL THE COMMENTS ON HERE I WOULD HOPE THAT SOMEONE IS LISTENING AND BRINGS IT BACK..

No more chemical lipstick I absolutely love lip shimmers. The color lasts all day. When I put the lip shimmer on, it feels like I'm putting on really good quality lip balm, but it looks as sophisticated at any lipstick I've ever used. I won't ever buy lipstick again. Only lip shimmer for me!

Love this product I love the lightweight color, shine and the tingle it gives my lips. Keeps my lips moist and I take it with me everywhere. It's also great that it's 100 natural unlike so many other lip balms/gloss. The only thing that could make it better was if it had SPF protection.

Cocoa Lip Shimmer It's been over a year now, and I'm still desperately missing your cocoa lip shimmer. I've tried at least a dozen substitutes, and nothing comes close. Maybe you could consider the limited release of discontinued colors on an annual basis. The demand is certainly there.

Miss the coffee shade!! I love the feel of the lip shimmers, a perfect blend of color with moisturizing but none of the colors are as flattering on me as the discontinued coffee. Please bring back the shade of coffee! I've tried most of the new shades- they're all lovely but none compare!!!!

Happiness I ended up getting three of these Radiance, Champagne, and Watermelon. And I love them all. They instantly make chapped lips soft and shimmery ad they smell like mint. Champagne is my favorite because it's a very light pink and it's more shimmery than the other two.
Moisturizes well It moisturizes well. I could see the difference within a couple of days. It is slightly heavy so I only use it a night.

Great 2 in 1 product! I have been a fan of these for a long time, love that they add new colors all the time. This works as a great moisturizer, as well as adding slightly more than a hint of color to my lips. I carry one in my purse at all times! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

My favorite lipwear This is all I use on my lips. My lips are so moist from this product. I have one at work, one in my purse, and one at home. I don't ever want to be without this lipwear. I ride a motorcycle and this stay on a long time so my lips never get chapped from the wind.

Crazy for Cocoa Your current pink pallet does not suit me. My daughter and I are crazy for cocoa. Obsessed with this lip color. I look in every town I visit hoping to find some out-of-the-way stash. When will we see Cocoa Lip Shimmer back on the shelf

Usable even for me I always stay far away from make-up with all of the stuff in it that isn't healthy, but I decided to try give this a try and it's FANTASTIC - it lasts for a couple of hours, comes in a variety of shades, and doesn't give my lips any problems. Definitely going to keep using, and going to try some of thier other beauty products.

Wonderful Product I have used this product for years and my skin is supple and has very few wrinkles. People constantly come up to me and comment on what lovely skin I have. I also have people commenting that I look 20 years younger than my actual age. I know my Regenerist Deep Hydration Regenerating Cream has been a huge help in staying young looking. It is velvety and rich and my skin drinks it in. I love it! My foundation smooths on easily over my Hydrating Cream and my complexion has a dewy glow. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Bring back the Cocoa lip shimmer! I have been searching everywhere for months for cocoa lip shimmer! My online search has brought me here to learn it is discontinued. By reading through the reviews I see many, many, many other loyal users of cocoa lip shimmer are equally dismayed! It was the only lip color I used and LOVED it!!! Please, please, please bring it back!

One of my all time favorites! I love the tingly peppermint feeling you get when you get when applying this product. It's like putting on chapstick with a great color. With the different color options it's easy to find some shades to try. I got some last year as gifts and I love it. While not all the shades look great on me, it's easy to find one that does.

Excellent Lip Shimmers!!! I've been using Burt's Bees Replenishing Lip Balm with Pomegranate oil for awhile now, and I've been loving it!!! So, I decided to buy Lip Shimmers just to try out and I love them even more!!! ) I bought Champagne, Watermelon, and Rhubarb!!! Great colors! Lip Shimmers moisturizes and add color to your lips!!! Great product!!!

Can't Go Without I have always used Burt's Bees Lip Balm under my lip gloss, but since I found this, I no longer need the lip gloss. I am a brown, earthy tone girl and I love the caramel color. It is so light and feels just like the lip balm although it adds just the perfect amount of color for me. Another must have in the land of Bees

Please bring TOFFEE Back! I too would only wear Toffee and everyone always stopped to ask me about my lipstick. I have not found anything that comes close to this shade and look ALL of the time for a replacement. It was so popular why can you not bring it back...even just as seasonal color... I am sure many of us will stock up! PLEASE!!!

Great product I don't like to wear lipstick (or pay the price of lipstick) but know I look better with a little color. This little stick solves the problem by giving me that color painlessly. It doesn't dry like some lipsticks and has the lovely peppermint flavor. I would apply lip balm anyway so I am glad it comes with some color!
COCOA THANK YOU SO MUCH for bringing Cocoa back! I get SO many compliments when I wear it. It is my absolute favorite color!!!

COCOA! COCOA! COCOA! Please, please bring back Cocoa Lip Shimmer!!! I've hooked all my friends on this and then you discontinued it! It is the perfect color for wearing on its own, layering with other colors and so on. I get more compliments when I wear this than any other lip color I own. Please, I'm begging you...bring it back!!!

BRING BACK COCOA TOFFEE!!!! You all missed the boat on this one. Why doesn't whomever made the poor decision to discontinue Cocoa and Toffee ante up to their error and bring it back! You have endless reviews asking same. In my close circle of ten friends, five used Cocoa! Seriously ... please bring it back. Your new colors are NO match.

Lifesaver I was on a cruise and some how ended up with sunburnt lips. A friend I was traveling with gave me her Burt's Bee lip shimmer. I used it and boy what a life saver it was. It not only kept my lips moist but covered up the ugly spots from the sun damage. Since the cruise I have purchased this product multiple times. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Regenerating Cream I loved this product. My skin was so soft and fresh looking. It took years off of my look. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Favorite all-time gloss! I absolutely LOVE this Lip Shimmer. It is great to have in my purse or even small enough to put in a jeans pocket for on the run. It looks great, feels great and smells great. I love that it adds some color, while moisturizing my lips. Burt's Bees' Lip Shimmer is the best all-around color gloss in the market!

3 this! Cocoa lip shimmer is the absolute perfect shade of lip color! It is neutral enough that it can be worn with any makeup and clothing color combinations, yet has just the right amount of color to really make your lips pop!! The texture and tingle are just added bonuses. So happy BB brought this shade back!!! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Chapstick and Lipgloss in one I really like the Burt's Bee's Lip Shimmer. I have the watermelon one. My lips chap very easy and I prefer glosses to lipsticks when I need to be more made-up. But, lip gloss tends to dry out my lips. This doesn't happen with the lip shimmer. The product also feels and smells nice. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Feels and looks great I love lip shimmers. They feel great on. It is the best of both worlds. You get the tingle and moisture of a Burts Bees lip balm with the color and shimmer on top of it. I keep these in my purse as my everyday go to lip colors. I wear other items but always go back to these. I highly recommend lip shimmers!

Addicted! I have been using these lip shimmers practically since they were first introduced. A former lipstick wearer, I prefer wearing strong colors and hope that I will never be forced back to standard lipstick again. For such a glossy product, it has remarkably long wearability and feels so natural. Thanks, Burts Bees!

It's my go-to product I love the color Peony! I make sure that I have one at home, at the office, in my purse, everywhere. It keeps my lips moisturized and gives me that little bit of color that is so natural. The peppermint tingle is an added bonus. Love this product and use it all the time. Thanks Burt's Bees! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

PLEASE listen to your loyal customers!! PLEASE BRING BACK THE COCOA LIP SHIMMER!! I too have tried every other lip shimmer color you offer, NOTHING works the same. The Cocoa was the perfect neutral color, had lasting power with awesome moisture and never got cakey on my lips. BRING IT BACK BURT'S BEES!!!!!!! (Your loyal customer would be so happy!)

PLEASE bring back Cocoa Cocoa has been my go-to color for years. It's the best color for wearing alone, and also works with with lipstick or other Lip Shimmer shades (e.g Plum). Please bring it back. I can see I'm not alone in my disappointment, it appears to be a movement! So please listen to your loyal customers and bring back this favorite. Thank you!

Love this stuff............. I just love this stuff. I have it in 3 colors, rhubarb is my favorite. It goes on so smoothly and makes my lips feel so good. It is not heavy or waxy like some products. The tube is slim and fits perfectly in my jeans pocket with no bulge. I live in a real dry climate and my brother even used it once, in a pinch! Great stuff.

Major Cocoa Deprivation!!!!! When you discontinued Toffee I was miserable...nothing compares, but at least I still had Cocoa!!! I cannot live without Cocoa...I've tried all of your other colors (new and old) but none compare to the timeless, neutral and beautiful color of Cocoa!!! Why deprive all of us of this very popular color I am so depressed!!!!

Love This Product This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin soft, smooth and non-greasy. I like the dispenser as it puts the lotion in my palm without contaminating the unused product by touching it with my fingers. Have found that I do not need a full pump of the product because that is way too much for covering my face and neck. Anyone who has dry skin should not hesitate to give this a try.

Love the Tingle! I have been buying Lip Shimmer for several years and just love them! I just wish that the colorless one wasn't discontinued. Sometimes, I don't want color, but still love the peppermint oil effect. (Also, nuns cannot wear color I bought the colorless ones for little gifts for them.) Please bring back the colorless Lip Shimmer!

Amazing! I literally just put this lip shimmer on for the first time and I absolutely LOVE IT! It made my lips tingle the minute I put it on, it's almost like I can feel my dry lips healing and the moisture absorbing instantly. I also love that they have such flattering colors! I will be purchasing more my next shopping trip for sure :)

Peony Lip Shiimmer I have to say that Peony is my favorite color. I have tried all of the colors, including several discontinued ones, and this one is like a great combination of several. For me it is like wearing Caramel, Watermelon, and Strawberry all at once! Thumbs up, and I hope this one stays on the product line for years to come!

Peony is my favorite! I have fair skin and don't like to wear lipstick at all since, even the most fairest of shades, look really intense with my complexion. I saw some Burt's Bees at my local grocers and bought the shade closest to my natural lip color, which was Peony. It is the best thing ever and I enjoy the little hint of minty freshness.

Love it This lip balm is excellent. It really moisturizes and it has a tingly feel with a minty scent. Fig is perfect for me, it looks like my natural lip color, just a little deeper, and it has minimal shimmer. Peony is a pretty pink color with more shimmer. They're both very sheer and don't stick to my hair like lipgloss does.

Never leave home without it! You can't go wrong with any of the colors of this Lip Shimmer. I think I've tried most of them. It's like an addiction! My fave right now is the Caramel color. It adds just enough subdued lip color for everyday wear. Unlike many so called moisturizing lip balms this one truly does keep my lips looking and feeling good! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Toffee Lip Shimmer Please, please bring this color back. I have approached many cosmetic counters in department stores and immediately the first comment is that my lip shade is very pretty. I am ALWAYS proud to say that it is a Toffee from Burt's Bees. I have tried to find a product and color that will be as satisfying and there is none.

Great Products I have been using BB for years and now cannot find the Lip Shimmer in Toffee, perfect color for me I now have to go to a different product, please come back with the color or tell me where to find it. Love the tinted lip gloss and the eye cream. All of the products I have tried are wonderful. A faithful customer. Gail

Please bring back Papaya, Cocoa and Nutmeg Please bring back my favorite colors-Papaya, Nutmeg and Cocoa. I have used these for so long and love them, I've tried other colors and they are not the same. Why did you guys discontinue them I see alot of other people are wanting some colors back, please consider it. I'm not sure what I will use now, I was so happy with these shades-it's all I ever use. lip shimmer LOVE lip shimmer! It is the only product I use on my lips. Even during the winter, I don't ever have to use chap stick. It has a refreshing minty scent and flavor and feels really moist and creamy. My favorite colors are watermelon, rhubarb, raisin, and merlot. Looks natural but adds a bit of color. I keep one in my purse, my car and my pocket. LOVE MY LIP SHIMMER!
Great Moisturizer The best moisturizer I have found. Non greasy. Absorbes quickly and works wonderfully This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Great product I love the lip shimmer . I love the way it feels when you put it on. This should be in every girls makeup bag. Its a healthier option than other companies that put lots of chemicals into there make up. The lip shimmer is very similar to the lip balm everyone loves, except that it has pigment. LOVE that Burt's Bees has expanded their products to include makeup.

Love, love, love it! I thought I was confined to a life without lip color. I break out in blisters using regular lipsticks and lip balms but I have used Burt's lip shimmers for years and have never had a problem. The colors are subtle and blend well with my natural look. I also love that Burt's periodically comes out with new colors to keep my look fresh and seasonally appropriate.

Can not believe Cocoa is GONE!!! Love the product HATE that Cocoa is GONE! I have read many of the comments and it is obvious that a mistake was made in discontinuing Cocoa!! I sit here with four colors Plum, Fig, Peony, Watermelon and not one of them or even a combination of them even come close to Cocoa. None of them even look nice on me very disappointing. Please bring back Cocoa and SOON.

Miss the Cocoa lip shimmer Have been using the cocoa lip shimmer for a few years now and have been searching for it the last month, came on-line to order it and am VERY sad and disappointed to find out it is no longer available. I am with some of the others and am begging you to PLEASE bring it back!! No other colors come close. That has become the only lipstick I use other than glosses.

Bring Back Cocoa!!!! I am scrapping the very last bits out of my last tube of Cocoa and now find out I can't buy it anymore!!!! There isn't a shade even close to it, and its my next favorite after Watermelon. Please bring it back! I have ditched all lip products for just Burt's Bees..... it takes care of keeping my lips moist and not chapped and great hint of color! Love it!

COCCOA I have shopped for a color for years and fell in LOVE with coccoa! I would buy 2 at a time to make sure I always had one with me. Since I found out that it was discontinued I have tried all the other colors and am very disappointed. I now have started looking at other brands to find what I need since you stopped making the best color ever!! Please bring it back!

Toss your other lipsticks! I have just thrown out all my other lipsticks, glosses, stains and have purchased only the Lip Shimmers. I wish B.B.'s would get them back in stock, they are both fabulous colors!

Great Tints I'm not much of a lipstick wearer, so I was excited to give these a try. I love that they give a natural tint to my lips, nothing to bold. Watermelon and Champange are my favorites for daytime and Rhubarb for going out at night. I like the light texture and the peppermint flavour. It keeps my lips moisturized and makes my mouth smell fresh all at the same time.

Hallelujah!! Cocoa is back!! I am pleased as pie to say the least. However However However this does not mean I can instantly release my grudge and disdain and resentment towards the company for taking it away in the first place. And the years of agony suffering thru dull unflattering alternative lipsticks and shades. But this is a start. Please keep Cocoa and Guava till the end of time.

burtbees lip shimmer i love love this product tried the first time in guava my best friend tried it and loved it so I gave her mine bought other shades rhubarb and raisin and replaced my guava they do exactly what it says moisturizing all day and great natural color with little shimmer and very kissable! oh yeah my cousin took my raisin im so asking Burts Bees for my Birthday !!

Great Product For A Reasonable Price This is a really good product. It feels light on my skin immediately feels like it's hydrating my skin. I recently turned 60, and many of the people I have told my age to insist that I look like I'm 45! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

where's the toffee I found the perfect color for me from any lipstick I have ever used, toffee lip shimmer. But I can't find it anymore and am so disappointed. It is a great neutral that I would think could go with any skin tone and it has a shimmer to it that lasts and lasts. Probably won't use any of the others, I'll be looking for a diffferent brand untill this comes back.

Love it!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff! I have used Toffee for over a year and it is the best color for me. I also have the Caramel, which is pretty, but a much more sheer shade. The only thing is, I can't find Toffee in my area. Many places will have Lip Shimmers, but will not carry my favorite shade! I will continue to order it online because I love it so much!!!

Finally! After a LIFETIME of searching for the right lipstick (and spending hundreds of dollars on the quest) I have finally found my color. Burt's Bees Plum, it is absolutely perfect, stays on long enough, and doesn't bleed or get all cakey. I love it, and it's so affordable compared to all those expensive designer lipsticks! Thank you thank you thank you...

love lip shimmers I cant say enough of how much I love the shimmers line but noticed that you have an over whelming response from people to bring back the shade cocoa..that is my favorite shade but also love watermelon..if people are pleading with you to bring back cocoa why dont you exspecially if you know it would be profitable for burts and the customer would be happy..

Long Lasting and Beautiful I put Rhubarb on after breakfast and it stays put until lunch! I normally reapply traditional lipstick often, since they lose their luster and shine shortly after applying. I love that this goes on smooth and the color really absorbs. This is the perfect product for people who like the shine of a gloss with the lighter feel of a lipstick. Thanks Burt!

COCOA DISCONTINUED BIG MISTAKE! I can not believe that you've DISCONTINUED COCOA!! I've had so many compliments on this color and people ask me ALL the time what I'm wearing. Suer gots a purty mouf I don't wear a lot of makeup, I think this is a great product, it smells great, lasts a fair amount of time (color wise), and it makes my lips feel amazingly soft. Unlike other lip balms I can use this before I go to bed and it doesn't make my skin break out. I do think that it could have a more powerful mintyness to it like the classic burts balms.

One of my favorite lip products I absolute adore this product. The color is not too intense, and the minty feel after each application just wakes me up. My lips feel so much softer after using this product. My young daughter found my lip shimmer and too it away. She loved it so much, so I bought her own, so she wouldn't try to use mine. This is great stuff. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Great Product This is my favorite of all the Burt Bees products. I use it several times a day and it has replaced my lipstick and chapstick during the day. I love the soft and creamy feel of the stick. I bought a case of these and keep one in my car, vanity, and every purse I own. It does not stay on as long as I would like though. The colors are very nice.

Love my Lip Shimmers I have bought lip shimmers in Peony, Watermelon and Rhubarb and have loved them all. They are light and add just enough shimmer and color. The Peony is also great for applying over other lipsticks to make them sparkle. Lip shimmers are not cakey like some lipsticks, not waxy like some lip balms. They are smooth, soft and I love wearing them. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Works Immediately! I have used several Olay products and have been pleased with them. However when my skin was getting really dry and flaky I knew I needed something hard core. I was amazed how after one use I could tell a difference the next morning! I am so excited! ...Just wish they would give you more lotion for the .

Please PLEASE Bring Back Toffee!! I LOVE this product, the minty smell, the moisturizer and lip color in one convenient tube for a mom on the go, but I do NOT know what I will DO without my Toffee Color! I too find it to be the one color I come back to all the time, or mix with other colors to make them mine. Please bring it back! I know I am not the only one looking for it!

Lip Shimmer - Toffee I am completely addicted to Burt's Bee's Lip Shimmer, color Toffee but I can no longer find it in stores. The color is perfect... not too dark, not too light, it's a nice shimmery brown. I have been to every store in San Antonio and I can't find it, I hope they haven't stopped making that color. The color isn't even on the displays any more.

Great product! I got this one in champagne and I really like it! The shimmer isn't overwhelming and the texture is nice. It feels good on my lips and has a light peppermint scent. I like that the color mostly matches my lips, giving only a little tint. I actually like the color of my lips, but wanted to give this product a try and I'm glad I did!

great colors Love the product!!! This product is really nice because offers the option of having a lipstick and a lip balm in one product for very little money. Easy to carry in the purse, or pockets. Plus, it has a mint scent that makes me feel that my mouth fresh. I got three colors, Peony, Rhubarb, and watermelon, and I must say they look great. Love this lip shimmer!!!!

The only lip coloring for me This really is the only lip product I use - I like the plum and neutral shades. I don't need a mirror for the light shade, and I need to always have something protecting my lips in Colorado. It never cakes, or does anything uncomfortable, so I don't need to fuss with it at all - just keep reapplying it as it dries out in the sun we enjoy here. Lovely Color Like with many Burt's Bee lip products, I love the cooling sensation and with these lip shimmers, love them! The shimmer is natural looking switch is another plus. Hope to get more!

Cocoa Pleeeeeeeeeaaaaaasssse! I, along with many many others am wondering why the Cocoa lip shimmer is no longer available. It truly was a universal color that would go with almost anything. Bring Back Cocoa Please! Best Lipstick ever! Please bring Cocoa Lip Shimmer back. It is the most perfect lip color, great for all seasons, occasions, refreshing to wear! It is timeless. Color and Balm in one I love this little lipstick.I am light skinned and use the Peony. As a woman of age, I appreciate a lipstick that moisturizes and gives a subtle color. Where did Cocoa go My 5 star rating is for the color Cocoa, but it is no longer offered. I am disappointed to learn that you Cocoa lip Shimmer is discontinued. great moisturizer The best moisturizer I have found. Non greasy. Absorbes quickly and works wonderfully This review was collected as part of a promotion.

No more Coffee I love B B Lip Shimmer! But, as per usual, when I find a product that I like it becomes discontinued. I currently have Lip Shimmer in Coffee and it appears that when it's gone I won't find anymore. Why oh why I'm starting to feel like the kiss of death to products! Have tried other colors in that color group, but the others don't have the deep color that the Coffee does. Help!

Love This Product I purchased this product in Champagne. I love the shimmer and how it sparkles. For not being very thick it lasts a while too, which is great for going out. i don't have to constantly reapply or worry about it wearing off after ten minutes. I love how this product is so smooth and feels like a balm, but still has a lot of color and shine to it. I'm very happy with this purchase!

It has to be COCOA As so many have said here already, please bring back Cocoa. I have used it for years and there is nothing else close to it. I got smart and bought more than one when I was able to find it. I have no idea why it would be dropped.

Nice Shiny Color I really enjoyed the smoothly it applied and the shade was aptly described (Peony) and I was not disappointed with the color choice. It has a subtle sparkle that doesn't make it seem childish for more mature users who like a hint of fun in their face. The moisture is good, I found I needed to reapply about 6 hours to retain the moisture even though the color was still visible. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

My Favorite is BACK!! Thank you sooooo much for bringing Cocoa back. I am using my last tube (I stocked up some time ago when they discontinued the shade. It's the perfect natural color that I often wear it as my lipstick day into evening.

discontinued I'm very disappointed that they have discontinued the lip shimmer in 'Toffee'...i've tried other colors along with the 'Cocoa'..and these two are my favorite...i've been using these lip shimmers for a very long time and the Toffee is still my favorite I still keep looking in the stores hoping that Burt's Bees will bring this color back....please please please.....love them.....

BRING back COCOA!!!!! I'm joining the crowd...I, too, have looked high and low for more COCOA LIP SHIMMER in stores to no avail! Did you rename it Please listen to the masses...we LOVE COCOA!!! It always seemed low in quantiy in stores--I'm assuming that means it's a great seller! From the looks of these reviews, it was! PLEASE BRING COCOA BACK!!!!! Signed, Customer of COCOA for MANY YEARS!

sanr I just took a chance that I could buy the lip shimmer online. to my great surprise I could. Recently I was told that they could no longer be purchased by a dealer. I was soooo happy to find out different. thank you for this wonderful product. It is not only color, but treatment...and it work GREAT!!!! Thank you again and please do not discontinue!! I love all the products!!!

So far so good I bought this a few days ago and so far it's working really well. The Nutmeg color is good, even though I am fair skinned and not one to wear lip color at ALL. My husband likes the color and the smell, and what I like is that it is not lipstick but gives my lips a nice hint of color.

My Favorite Lip Product! This is my favorite product to wear on my lips! I love the Fig color! REGENERATING DEEP HYDRATION CREAM MOISTURIZER I like its rich dewy thick consistency. Great night cream - won't rub off on pillow! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

WOW! Even my 77 year old Mom is a fan! I gave my Mother your Lip Shimmer in Raison and she loves it! Great alternative to lip stick and gloss I do not like lipstick it makes my lips feel funny, and lip glass is sticky. Burt's Bee Shimmer is perfect for me. I love this stuff and the fact that I put it on and forget its there no sticky or greasy feeling that I get with lip stick or glosses. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Feels great! this feels so nice and has a wonderful peppermint smell! I have only tried Peony so far but will definatly buy in different colors now. It moisturizes while providing just the right amount of color.

Cocoa lover I can't believe you pulled cocoa lip shimmer. I have used this for years, as have many others. Bring back COCOA!!! I echo everyone else's sentiments: you need to bring Cocoa Lip Shimmer back! Shimmering ips Brilliant! Did some genius wake up one morning and say I've got it! Then came the boring focus groups to confirm. Natual women like having soft, pink lips. Cocoa Lip Shimmer Is is really true that the cocoa lip shimmer is discontinued I've been to store after store in search of it and it's the only color I actually like. Cocoa Lip Shimmer is the best! I'm addicted to this lip shimmer and I'm so glad Cocoa is back. I'm stocking up!

Love this Product I love this product for several reasons. I bought this in the watermelon color, which is a light shimmery purple color and it looks really nice on. This lip shimmer balm also holds a slight minty taste which feels nice. In addition, it is very comfortable to carry around in a purse because of its size.
