Amazing product This product it's amazing because it makes your skin feel younger

This stuff works! I've been using this product for a little over a week now and for I'm loving it! After two days of use I noticed how soft and smooth my skin felt. Excited to continue using this in hopes that it will work as advertised! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Good as a night moisturizer A week ago I starting using the L'OREAL Deep-Acting Moisturizer as a night lotion. I think it is too greasy to use it during the day. It is perfect for night time though. I am 45 and my skin feels very smooth and looks well hydrated after using it. The scent is not unpleasant. I am also using it on my neck and decolletage. I have not noticed anything regarding my forehead wrinkles or the fine lines around my eyes. But I have used it only for a week, it probably needs more time to see a difference in wrinkles. I have also sensitive skin and have no issues with this product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Leaves skin feeling soft I was surprised how much I found I like this moisturizer. I found my skin felt softer even after 1 use. I also felt that my skin was slightly firmer as well due to having Hyaluronic Acid which helps combat signs of aging. I am more than pleasantly surprised on how non-greasy it feels on my face. I think L'Oral Triple Power Deep Acting Moisturizer works just as well as some of the higher end brands. I also feel it works even better as part of the Triple Power regiment with the serum and lotion. I would highly recommend all 3 products together in any woman looking to combat signs of aging. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Very good Moisturizer L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer leaves my skin feeling fresh and smooth for the whole day! This is a great base for makeup. I just use compact powder on the moisturizer and I see no shine or greasiness for a minimum of 7 hours. My skin feels fresh and no breakouts yet which I am very happy about. I have been using it only for about a week now so I'm not sure if it's working for wrinkles and tightening but I will try it for another week and update. Overall a very good product. I recommend this to anyone looking for fresh and clean look. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Another good one! I had my doubts when I tried this product, but after using it every morning and night for over three weeks now, I can honestly tell a difference in my skin! As far as absorbing into my skin, it took a little bit of time, but nothing too crazy. Sometimes I could still feel the product on my skin pulling away from the pillowcase if I was laying on my side. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Positive moisturizing results I use the L'Oreal Paris revitalift Triple Power deep acting facial moisturizer in conjunction with the facial serum treatment. I would first use the facial serum treatment followed by the moisturizer. I had a very positive experience with the moisturizer. I found it to be thick but upon application did not feel heavy upon my face. I use both these products everyday for the past 3 weeks and have noticed and overall General reduction in the wrinkles and smoothness of my skin. It is a product I would consider continue using for my facial needs. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Triple Power Moisturizer This product contains parabens, so if I looked at in on the store shelf i would pass it, because i am trying to steer clear of that, but because i have seen subtle results in 5 days, i would now consider buying this. This moisturizer is very thick, so it will be good to use during the winter months. When putting this on it felt almost like velvet and was absorbed by my face very well. This is too heavy for me to wear in the morning underneath my foundation, it made my makeup look ashy, but I do put it on before bed after the Triple Power Serum, and when I wake up, my skin feels super soft. I will continue to try this product to see if my laugh lines will get less noticeable. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Finally a product that works I've been trying to find the best wrinkle reducer on the market and it has been very hectic. I went into Loreal's Revitalift thinking ANOTHER BOMB. But, I tried these products and did exactly what the instructions stated. I didn't miss a day. And what I found was a product that actually works. These products, Serum, Day Moisture and Deep Moisturizer, do what they say. All three have Hyaluronic Acid in them. I don't know if that is what the key is, but I do know my skin has gotten tighter, smoother, dark spots are fading and my wrinkles are reduced. I was amazed that a drug store product can do what this does. Good Job L'Oreal. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Non greasy moisturizer- excellent for sensitive skin I am in my early 30's and have been using the L'Oral Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer, L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Concentrated Facial Serum Treatment, and L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Facial Day Lotion SPF 20 for 10 days now and so far I am pleased with the results: Pros: This moisturizer is wonderful for sensitive skin- it's also non greasy, and fast absorbing. I've noticed my skin is smoother and well hydrated after trying these products for 10 days. Since my skin is hydrated I also noticed less fine lines near my eyes. Con: The cream is a moderately strong scented product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Good product This product smells amazing because it's good into skin I used this product almost 7 years now and I love the lotion for the face also

Long lasting moisture! I really like this product because coupled with the serum applied at night, I felt that my skin stayed moisturized through the night and day. It spreads very well, has a light scent that disappears in minutes and does not feel heavy or greasy on my skin. It deserves 3 stars, but I gave the product four stars because it was the only product out of the three that I felt did something- something being it moisturized. I didn't notice any changes in refirming or redensifying my skin, but I do like the product. I probably would not buy again unless after finishing the jar I notice something that really does it for my skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Rich and creamy moisturizer The L'Oral Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer felt very rich and creamy. Even though I applied a thin layer on my face it felt thick and heavy. It was also very fragrant which I thought could sometimes be overwhelming. However, after the first week of using this moisturizer I noticed that my skin felt smoother to the touch. After 3 weeks my skin felt and looked somewhat firmer. However, I would like more time to actually confirm this statement. I applied the moisturizer in the morning after I cleansed my face and again at night after I cleansed my face before bedtime. Based on the results of this moisturizer I would definitely recommend it. The thickness and fragrance wouldn't be enough of a negative for me not to recommend it. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer I used this product along with the serum as recommended on the packaging. At first I did not like the way this product felt combined with the serum. It felt heavy on my skin, and a little bit goopy, so I wasn't expecting to end up liking it as much as I did. After about 2 minutes of allowing the product to dry, the heavy, goopy feeling disappears, leaving your skin feeling very soft and refreshed. I thought that if I were to continue to use these products, I would have to do so separately at different times of day, but I was pleasantly surprised that they ended up working so well together! My only complaint with this set of products is the scent. I'm very sensitive to scents, so even the lightest one can be overpowering to me. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

So far, so good So far, I've really like this moisturizer. I use it at night and wake up to super soft skin. However, sometimes I feel like I can still feel it on my face once I wake up, like it wasn't completely absorbed. Not sure if that's a bad thing or not. But I'm still liking it althought it hasn't been a miracle worker or anything. I haven't really noticed a decrease in wrinkles or sun spots, but my skin has been soft and clear, and I'm super happy with that. This has the same scent as the other two products in this line, the serum and day lotion, which is quite frangrant. It's not a bad smell, I actually rather like it, but if someone is sensitive to smells, this may be too much for them. Just something to keep in mind. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Love it! I saw a noticable difference in my skin within a week!
tried revitalift instant absorption non greasy didn't blur my vision

Oily T-Zone Balancing Act Beginning from the beginning, the packaging is beautiful to me. A bit reminiscent of some Olay or Avon products, but no matter, it looks quite prestige. The jar you get with this product is indeed not full to the brim but you only need a dollop on the tip of your finger, dotted about the face and massaged in to apply. The first scent I got was of a fresh floral arranged study or a window box. It was lovely, however, once mixed with skins natural oils, it became a bit too sweet and soapy smelling. This disappates after an hour or so. Applying this in the morning after my face washing routine, I did not need to blot until around happy hour. It, in concert with other products in this line, balanced my oily t-zone (a near miracle). As with any product I test, I like to try to take as much of the time allotted to give the product a REAL go. I get to see how it reacts during mentrual cycles, during different weather, stress, and long days or nights. This product held up like a poised socialite and didn't break a sweat haha. You will enjoy this moisturizer, it isn't too thick, especially now as it gets cooler outside, and leaves your face feeling...cared for. This one is a go buy. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Seems to be working I've been trying these products for about a week now and I could already see and feel some improvements for sure. The first day I wasnt impressed. It left residue on my face and it tingled and itched. But I probably didn't wash my face well enough. So I gave it another shot. A little goes a long way with this moisturizer I just Dan my finger in the jar twice and that's all I need for my entire face and neck. This one is very creamy so it takes a little longer to dry and absorb into the skin. It feels a bit sticky and thick until it really absorbs into your skin, after that my skin feels fine! It tingles a little still. If you don't like scented products this isn't the products for you because the have a strong perfume smell. The smell doesn't bother me. I have been putting it on every morning before I put my makeup and it has been a good moisturizer to prep my skin. I haven't been as consistent at night but I've been trying! I've noticed that my skin looks noticeably brighter and feels very smooth. It has done nothing for my dark circles but they are hereditary so I want ejecting any changes. I am going to continue to use these products and see where it gets me! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

A regular/standard moisturizer The moisturizer has the same consistency than other regular creams available in the Pharmacy. Is a heavy, oily and thick cream. I used it twice a day, in the morning and night. After Serum (Include neck). Nice scent, not heavy perfumed. And mild for use in sensitive skin (like me). After the serum, moisturizer, sunscreen I applied face primer, liquid base and powder. A lot of coats in my face but nevertheless, didn't feel too heavy or the skin breathless. So many products don't caused skin break outs. My only complaint, it's the oily and shine look during the rest of the day. Need to retouch the face with blotting Paper or Oil Control Powder. That's a con for the product. It's a good/regular product to consider to buy in the future, have a nice price. Really accessible. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Deeply moisturizing, feels great! After thoroughly trying out the L'Oral RevitaLift Triple Power Deep Acting Facial Moisturizer, I have to say that I've very much enjoyed both the instant results (deeply moisturized, not sticky or greasy, skin feels smooth and soft) and the results seen over time (skin looks and feels more plump, fine lines visibly reduced). I am looking forward to continued use and even better results. I do have two areas in which I am not happy with the product, however. Those areas would be that it is unclear whether or not the product is cruelty-free and that is something that is important to me. Also, I am not a fan of the very strong fragrance. It is kind of overwhelming and it actually gives me a slight headache until it wears off. In my opinion, facial products do not need to be fragranced! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
best ever best ever . never a second thought about buying this brand

Fan of the Moisturizer! I've been using this product for about a week now and I've noticed a difference in hydration and firmness! It smells nice and surprisingly absorbs rather quickly. Great Moisterizer This cream is rich and thick and a great moisterizer to help fix and prevent wrinkles. I have kind of fair dry skin and this really helps to keep it hydrated all day.

fingers crossed.. I started using a week ago and so far-so good.. I have noticed some firming and lines are becoming less noticeable. So I will continue and see where it takes me..
I really liked this moisturizer. I liked this moisturizer. I thought it absorbed quickly and didn't leave a film on my skin. It also smelled nice and I would recommend it to other women.
Noticible difference in fine lines and wrinkles. This product definatly helped with fine lines and wrinkles. Would be my favorite if it also helped with dark spots.

Power concentrated L'Oreal facial serum I think there has been some improvement in the wrinkle department . I am not sure why one needs to use two separate products twice a day. It is a lot of cream on my face, and in the second photo you may see that my face, especially my cheeks get quite red after application. That worries me a bit. Also the fragrance is a bit strong for my nose, but it is a good one, just a little less would be good. The two products go on easily and seem to penetrate the skin right away. The jar for the Deep acting moisturizer may look nice, but the square top is not as easy to open and close.i am only able to submit one photo, but a previous one show MORE wrinkles than this one (after 2 weeks of application) This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Smooth Skin I'm 33 years old with the beginnings on wrinkles that are starting to stick out when I'm not squinting or smiling. I tried a Neutrogena product first that really did nothing for me. I have combination skin that tends to break out sometimes in the cold weather. I have redness and rough spots as well as furrow lines, smile lines and fine lines by my eyes. I feel that this product hydrates my skin perfectly. If you have oily skin, it may be too much. After a week my wrinkles are appear a bit smoother, my skin is more even and my makeup goes on super smooth. The smell is nice, clean and crisp. This product is not extremely on the high side so I would definitely consider purchasing in the future. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Rich moisturizing goodness!! I've been using the L'Oreal RevitaLift Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer for the past 3 days I'd like to tell ya my thoughts on it. First, like the RevitaLift serum, I love the packaging. The jar is a lovely shade of red fits perfectly into the palm of your hand. Now, when you first feel the texture of the cream, although it's smooth, it is rather thick to the touch. Surprisingly, once it's applied to the face, it doesn't feel very heavy at all!! It definitely leaves your face feeling soft smooth. Lastly, the scent is a bit stronger than the serum in the collection but I don't find it to be overwhelming. Overall, I really like this facial lotion will continue using it to see what it can do long term. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Super soft feel. I liked how the RevitalLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer actually made my face feel smooth and my wrinkles less noticeable. The only problem I had was when I added all of the products in the mornings, they left my face oily. I did notice that when I put my makeup on that the wrinkles did not show as much. I was saddened to see that they don't appear to be reducing my wrinkles in the week that I've used them. I wanted to use the product for at least a week before I posted my review, because I wanted to be honest about it. The cream did not stain my pillow and by morning I no longer could smell the fragrance. My skin was soft, smooth and hydrated. I am very happy with this moisturizer with the exception of the fragrance. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Softer skin, improved texture I used this product along with the concentrated facial serum. I do have some fine wrinkles around my eyes that I have yet to see a difference in, but I am hopeful that this product will improve them over time. My one complaint about this product would be the scent. I found the flowery smell to be quite harsh and would prefer a unscented version or one with a more subtle fragrance. Love this moisturizer!!! My new favorite moisturizer! It's the same light floral scent as the other revitalift moisturizers, which I love. I do think some people (maybe with super oily skin) might find it too much for daytime wear. I would say my skin is normal to oily, and I don't always reach for this for a daytime moisturizer. Skin-Tastic! I want to give the product more time to give a better review. However, I was excited about being able to try out the L'oreal Paris RevitaLift system. Moisture rich I used the facial moisturizer twice a day following the serum treatment. The moisturizer seemed to provide long lasting protection throughout the day until the evening application was applied. This was a huge bonus considering I often reapplied my previous facial moisturizer several times a day. Upon application, the cream was a nice consistency, not too watery, not to thick, it was just right. The odor was pleasant and the product didn't leave my skin feeling oily or greasy. The reason I rated the product at 4 stars is due to a possible reaction to the product. I used this product in conjunction with the facial serum and after 3 days my skin started to become red and blotchy and received a stinging sensation upon application and lingering for about an hour or two. I can't tell which of the two products caused my reaction or if they were both at fault. I do have sensitive skin so it could very well have been both in my case. One thing is for sure, if you need deep moisturizing that lasts...this is your product. I was blessed to try this product for free through BzzAgent in return for leaving an honest review. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Good dry skin moisturizer I like this product as a night cream. It's not super heavy but if you put too much it does have a tendency to leave a 'greasy' layer. I used this in conjunction with 2 other RevitaLift moisturizers - the serum (which I use under this) the day cream with spf (which I use during the day) - but the results have been fairly noticeable especially for the 'testing' only being 15 days!!! (I had late shipping). I have normal to dry skin - with some days a bit oily in my T zone - but def leans towards dry. I do not recommend this for oily or acne/breakout prone skin. I also wouldn't use under makeup , as it's a pretty heavy duty cream. But for me it worked. I was overall pretty satisfied. The scent is a bit strong too for those whom prefer their face/skin care products to be scent free - not for y'all. After using this with the serum and day cream I have noticed more evening or skin tone - 'brightening' if you will , and some of the fine lines on my forehead seem to be a bit softer. I'm sure with continued use the results will keep on getting better. Thx BzzAgent and Loreal !!! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

I'm hoping that continued use will help with fine lines, but I haven't used it long enough to see those results yet. Rich night-time moisturizer I've been using L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer every night for the last two weeks. At first I was using it along with the Revitalift serum, but I found that this combination was just too rich for my face and I was waking up with an oily complexion, so I switched to using the moisturizer on its own and have had much better results. What this does tell me is that this might be a perfect match for those who struggle with extremely dry skin! I have noticed some difference in my complexion over the two weeks - most noticeably that my previously dry skin is now well moisturized - even over moisturized. The packaging is beautiful and luxe, however it is simply a jar, not a pump, so if you are concerned about bacteria you may want to use a spatula or spoon with this product. Very Hydrating but Smells too Strong As with the serum the first thing I noticed when I tried the product was the extremely pungent perfume fragrance. Again, had I not received this product as part of a Bzz Campaign I would have returned it without trying it because the smell was so strong and unpleasant, but I'm glad I did. This product is extremely hydrating! I feel like my face was moisturized all day! That fast fading dry feeling is my main complaint with other products and I was very pleased to not have to reapply moisturizers continuously all day to feel like I'm not drying out. I am definitely making L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer a normal part of my daily beauty regimine. As for the anti-agin effects, I haven't seen a dramatic change in my facial appearance, I have only been using it for 2 weeks so I will continue to try it and see what happens. But I would definitely recommend the products to others, just be prepared for the smell. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer from L'Oreal First off, I'm loving how professional and up-scale the container for this moisturizer looks on my white quarts bathroom countertops! The dark red really stands out, and its one of the few things I'm OK with leaving out as opposed to hiding in a drawer of cabinet! Though the look of the container is nice, a twist off top for moisturizer isn't ideal to me - I use this in the mornings when getting ready for work, so I want to be able to quickly pump some product onto my fingers without having to worry about re-twisting back on a top or getting the container covered in product. So that's one disappointment I have about the moisturizer. I'm also disappointed with the quantity in the container - for something that should be used daily, I'd expect more so that it would last longer. I've been using the L'Oreal Paris Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer for a few days now, mostly in the mornings after showering and washing my face. The texture is thick and feels soothing on my skin, though it does feel a little heavy if I accidentally use to much. I've learned that a little goes a long way, so be aware of this! My favorite aspect of this moisturizer is how long it lasts. I'm experimenting with using less foundation and BB cream and have found that even without these, if I use this moisturizer, in the afternoons my face still feels soft and protected (I find that I'm actually washing this product off my face in the evenings - it didn't necessarily rub off throughout the day). I have not noticed any particular change in how my skin looks (wrinkle lift, firming, etc.), except for the fact that my face looks noticeably moisturized and healthy (which is great, since that is clearly stated on the box as an outcome after one week of use and I've only been using this for maybe 5 days). Like many products, this is one that will take about 4 weeks to notice any difference in skin appearance, so don't be alarmed if you don't have any results right away. Overall, I'm happy with the texture and smoothness of the moisturizer and would definitely suggest it over the standard daily moisturizers - those then to dry up within a few hours. I'd gladly put this on every day and have a glowing smooth look, rather than covering up with foundation and BB creams! I just happen to prefer using this in the mornings rather than the evenings, so the twist off container is annoying to me when I'm trying to quickly get ready in the morning, but if you use it in the evenings or aren't in a hurry, then maybe it won't be a big deal to you. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

A little heavy, but effective I've been using the Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer primarily as part of my nighttime routine. I found it a little too heavy to wear during the day in addition to the serum and spf day moisturizer. It's very thick, but doesn't go on greasy. It absorbs well into the skin, and does leave my skin feeling soft. I had some trial and error time figuring out that more than once a day for this moisturizer was too much for me. Additionally, if I attempt to put make up over it, it feels a little like the two mix together and crumble off my skin. Used at night before bed though, I wake up with my skin feeling soft. I think it's a good option for a nighttime moisture surge. As with the other two products, my big complaint is with the scent, which reminds me of a cheap hotel shampoo or bar of soap. Not a smell I revel in. Thankfully application time is the only time I smell it, but I would certainly prefer something a little more feminine. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Still love that it is working on my skin. I find it my job to keep my skin young looking and this makes my job so much easier...I would recommend it, but only for night time use. Great Hydration I was apprehensive to try the entire Revitalift line because I do have somewhat sensitive skin, but also because I'm very prone to clogged pores and blackheads. Once I find a routine that works for me, I tend to stick with it for a long time, and only experiment with one or two different items at a time. About my skin: I have combo skin that leans towards oily. However, because I use a prescription retinol lotion each night, my skin does get dry. And sometimes, it gets really dehydrated so I have flaking skin on my nose which is also oily - it's not cute. First application I noticed that there was a strong smell. I happen to really like the scent, it reminds me of a L'Oreal hair conditioner that I used to use. I will say that the scent lasted on my skin for quite some time, so if you're highly sensitive to fragrance or you just prefer unscented skin care products, this might not be for you. The moisturizer smooths over the skin and feels really pleasant when applied. I did note that this was a bit heavy for me, but that's most likely because I do have some issues with oil. I used it for some time at night, and once under makeup when my skin was being particularly troublesome, and I did wake up with smoother and softer skin that felt really hydrated. However, it did clog my pores up. I definitely didn't have an issue with breakouts and it wasn't huge, but I did notice some extra clogged pores and a slight increase in blackheads while using this product. Overall, this is a great night moisturizer, especially with winter weather coming. I will definitely continue to use on my neck and chest, and I'll use it on my face when it's extra dry. I also used this as an intensive hand treatment and I LOVED it for that. I think this would be best geared toward drier skin types, because it is a bit heavy for oily skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Deeply Moisturizing Is Right! At 30 years old, I'm trying to care for my skin well but the combination of oily and dry makes it a bit of a challenge. L'Oreal Paris' RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer is truly deep acting and moisturizing. It goes on smoothly without being too heavy, goopy, or sticky. After use, my winter-worn skin was tighter, smoother, and brighter- it just seemed happier and clearly better cared for. Because of my combination skin, I realized daily use was too much for me so I cut down to a couple times a week all over and daily use just on drier parts of my skin. I recommend this to everyone for occasional use, but definitely for those who have drier skin and need the deep moisturizing. I even use it on my hands! After a day of baking and frequent hand washing and outdoor work in cold weather, my hands were chapped, dry, and worn, I used the facial moisturizer on them before bed and, in addition to instantly feeling better, they were soft and rejuvenated in the morning. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

My RevitalLift Experience Before I get a product I would want to know what it specifically does, what other user's reactions where to it, and if the company that produces it is known to deliver what is promised. Overall i'd say that had a good experience with L'Oreal RevitalLift. I tried the concentrated facial serum, the deep acting facial moisturizer and the facial day lotion SPF 20. I've been using them for about a week now and I really like the affect they've had on my skin. I had been looking for a product to soften my skin and make it look smoother and healthier and RevitaLift did just that. My face is very soft to the touch now and the products have a great fragrance to them. The only thing I didn't like is that my face is a little shiny. I'd be very interested to know what products are offered for people with oily skin. I have noticed this product before while shopping, but I thought it was a little too expensive. Now that i've had a chance to try it, i'll definitely consider purchasing it in the future. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Very Moisturizing I was a little worried when I first tried this moisturizer because its a little heavier than I'd normally choose. So I decided to use it as my night cream and I was a fan after my first night! The cream is super rich, a little goes a long way and yet it feels very light on my skin. I don't feel like I'm wearing a heavy cream. It makes my skin so soft and after a few days I could already see results. I have smoother and more hydrated skin. I've noticed my fine lines are already disappearing and I look younger. I get very dry skin, living in MN but using this cream I'm not have my usual flakiness and dullness. It absorbs very quickly and goes a long way. I use it on my face, neck and decolletage and I can see my skin already looks firmer and more vibrant! I also like the fresh, clean scent. I'm excited to see how this moisturizer works over the harsh MN winter! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Satisfied This cream has a nice scent, it lasts awhile and it seemed to lessen the appearance of the fine lines around my eyes. It is very thick so I only used it at night.

Very Moisturizing I've changed my skin care routine to the L'Oreal RivitaLift Triple Power line. I've been using it for a little over a week now. I use the Facial Serum morning and night, the Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer at night and the Facial Day Lotion in the morning. I haven't noticed a difference with my wrinkles but my skin feels softer and smoother. I tried using the Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer in the morning but I noticed my foundation wouldn't set over it. I switched to using the Day Lotion in the morning and now I don't have that problem. If I don't let the lotion soak in for a few minutes and use a primer before using foundation I do get some streaking. This line is very hydrating. I like the smell. It is a little strong but it dissipates quickly. It might be a little much for people sensitive to fragrance. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Rich and creamy. Luxury in a red bottle I am loving this L'Oral line. I am reviewing the deep acting facial moisturizer, and can say without a doubt it has left my skin feeling fresh. There is no greasy residue and it soaks into the skin rather quickly. There is no pungent scent. Instead it has a soft, average, aroma one normally expects from moisturizers. I use this as the third step in my L'Oral skin care line, and absolutely love it. A perfect finishing product for well hydrated skin. The lotion comes in a pot, and is rich and creamy. Very easy to apply, only a small amount of product is needed. I have raved to my mother about this long enough, she's now buying her own set! Thank you for sharing such a wonderful product! Bonus pic, showing what one swipe of moisturizer looks like. You can see how creamy it is! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

High quality moisturizer! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review on a product review website and I love it so much that I wanted to make sure my review was posted here too. gotitfree This moisturizer smells great and comes in a very sleek looking red glass jar. A little bit goes a long way. I have been using the product for almost 3 months and I am still on my first jar! I use it in combination with the Revitalift Concentrated Serum at night (I use the concentrated serum with the Revitalift Triple Power Day Lotion during the day). My face looks and feels great! The only downside I have experienced is that the moisturizer feels thick when I first put it on, which is why I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I just make sure I use it 10-15 minutes before I lay down on my pillow at night. Great, quality product that is priced well since it lasts for so long! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Beautifully smooth L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer was so smooth and silky to put on it almost felt like I wasn't using enough because I couldn't feel it rub into the skin like most moisturizers. It was very silky smooth , not greasy or oily, very soft and luxurious on the skin. I did feel my skin feeling more thick by the end of one week using this product. Although with a hormonal acne problem that's not the greatest because it seems blemishes are deeper under the skin. The age defying element was noticeable temporarily, but seemed to wear off by days end or by morning. Seemed to plump skin and smooth out fine lines and wrinkles This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Awesome product i tend to get really dry patches in areas of my face that can look quite dull even when i moisturized....until I started using the L'oreal Paris Revitalift Triple ower Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer...now my skin just glows to the point where even my BF mentions it. The biggest plus of this, apart from younger looking skin is that it contains an spf that doesn't feel heavy! love it! This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Olay regenerist It feels great on your skin.

No more dry skin I think L'Oreal revitalift triple power deep acting facial moisturizer is great. Before i started using it my face was extremely dry. After the second day of using it I had no more dry spots. You couldnt tell my skin was very dry days before. It is very easy to apply makeup over it. The only little bad thing is my nose gets a little oily through the day, but that doesnt stop me from using this great product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Nice product! I've used this a few times so far and really do like it. It has a light floral scent that's not overpowering, goes on smooth and fairly light. It felt good on my face though it did feel a bit sticky on my hands after so I did need to rinse them for comfort. But on my face it didn't feel that way. I've not noticed a change in my skin yet but it does feel good. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Love the way this smells!!! I used L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer and i absolutely love the was this moisturizer smells. The scent isn't too strong but leaves your face with a great scent. I used this every morning after washing my face and my face looks smoother and feels softer. I did find it to be a bit greasy but i wil still continue to use this product. I really liked it. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Really Impressed I received his as a free sample! I am really impressed that I got a full-size sample! I have been using this for over a week now every night before bed I'm impressed at how moisturize my skin is in the morning. My skin is smoother brighter. I think that some people would put off by the scent. Though it smells good some don't like a strong scent. I am really happy to have this in my routine! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

On the fence I was given this product to try at no cost by influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. After trying it for 14 days I've decided it needs more time to see actual results. What I've seen so far is super moisturized skin (live in a hit desert), bigger blackheads on my nose (the only place I usually get them), and an occasional larger than normal acne spot. I'm wondering if some of the molecules in this cream are too big and plug up my pores. I only put it on at night after my shower because some users were saying it was too thick to use before applying makeup. Overall I like how it moisturizes, but will hold off on giving a full opinion for another 45 days. Influenster, OlayAtWalmart and contest

Baby Soft! I've been using this product for 3 weeks now and my face feels the softest it's felt in a long time. I use this product in the morning, under my makeup, and in the evening. You only need to use a pea size amount as it goes a long way. My skin has always been on the dry side and I can definitely feel the difference and the moisture. I would definitely try this product and will recommend it to my friends.

Love My RevitaLift! I have been using the RevitaLift products for a few weeks now and I love the serum and deep-acting facial moisturizer combo the most! I have already started to see my fine lines around my eyes start to fade! The serum soaks in and I let it set for a few minutes before I use the deep acting facial moisturizer which is part of my bedtime routine. It smells great without being overwhelming and irritating to my skin. 3 weeks of using the products and my skin is softer, smoother, and has regained that natural glow. The only thing I have found so far that I would want to be different is the price. The RevitaLift products are more of a system and for it to be the most effective they are used in combination and it can get pricey if you purchase them all. I wish the prices would be a little less for each product or L'Oreal could offer a combo pack at a better price. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Softer Skin After using L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer for one week, my skin is feeling the effects. My skin is softer, and small dry patches have disappeared. The moisturizer smells good, and feels nice going on. It is not heavy, or watery, just right. I will definitely continue to use this product! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Oily T-Zone Balancing Act Beginning from the beginning, the packaging is beautiful to me. A bit reminiscent of some Olay or Avon products, but no matter, it looks quite prestige. The jar you get with this product is indeed not full to the brim but you only need a dollop on the tip of your finger, dotted about the face and massaged in to apply. The first scent I got was of a fresh floral arranged study or a window box. It was lovely, however, once mixed with skins natural oils, it became a bit too sweet and soapy smelling. This disappates after an hour or so. Applying this in the morning after my face washing routine, I did not need to blot until around happy hour. It, in concert with other products in this line, balanced my oily t-zone (a near miracle). As with any product I test, I like to try to take as much of the time allotted to give the product a REAL go. I get to see how it reacts during mentrual cycles, during different weather, stress, and long days or nights. This product held up like a poised socialite and didn't break a sweat haha. You will enjoy this moisturizer, it isn't too thick, especially now as it gets cooler outside, and leaves your face feeling...cared for. This one is a go buy. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
Great Product. Noticed a difference the very next day. Smells great very mild. Feels great on your skin.
Love this great skin care product My skin was so dry and damaged from the sun. Using this for 2 months I saw great results. I will never stop using this product it's been 5 months and still satisfied

Great Product Leaves my skin smooth without feeling oily. You can never start too early to prevent fine lines and wrinkles.

Very Good Moisturizer I really liked the thick texture of Revitalift. It was a very good moisturizer. During the winter I often get dry patches on my skin and this product really helped with that. I did notice a positive change in the texture of my skin and I will definitely use this product again.
Youthful Appearance I loved this product. After the first use I could feel the the affect it had on my skin. Out of all the products I have used, I would say this is the best.

Like This Moisturizer i like everything about this moisturizer...the feel, the smell, the texture, but I would like at least a 15 spf included so that I could wear it outdoors! It's perfect for cool days and nights indoors.
Revitalift Triple Power Deep-acting Moistuirizer made my face feel so soft and made me look younger
Love This! I loved the way it made my face feel as soon as I put it on. I could already tell a difference on my dry cheeks.
Great Job On The Face I wanted to keep my face looking young

Blended In So Well! When I appled the RevitaLift Triple Power sample I received in the mail I was impressed on how well it blended into my skin. It was like it was never there, no heavy, filmy feel afterwards. Left my skin feeling refreshed!

Great Moisturizer I think this is a great moisturizer. It went on smoothly and evenly. Made my face feel immediately soft and smooth and not a bit greasy. My face did not seem to get that shine throughout the day which is a good thing. I can see the benefits with continued use of this product. I imagine that wrinkles would diminish, my crows feet would become tiny lines. The skin was actually softer with this limited use, I believe it would become eventoned and healthier.

olay products Effectiveness,price all worth for this product, I really like this for my aging dull skin,at my age it's hard to find a product that helps my skin get hydrated. Revitallift Triple Power 5 Days just wasn't long enough to give a through review, I did find that the product seemed to work great , smelled nice , no greasy mess left on my face, hopefully my small lines and wrinkles will fade away with continued use.

Love This Moisturizer! I really wanted to start using anti aging products and when I received the sample in the mail I was very impressed. I use it right after I wash my face and also apply it on my neck area. The packaging is very pretty and I love the color!! It is a great product and I definitely recommend it!

Love The Smooth Feel! I have dry skin on my face and it is especially noticeable in the winter months. I have used the moisturizer twice so far and was very pleased with the way my face looked. It not only made my face feel smooth
Supple N Smooth I got samples in the mail and as long as it lasted I really liked the cream. Smooth, thick but not greasy. My face felt nice

I Really Liked This Moisturizer. I liked this moisturizer. I thought it absorbed quickly and didn't leave a film on my skin. It also smelled nice and I would recommend it to other women.

Only Used For A Week I am only one week into this regime and I believe I am seeing a difference in elasticity and fewer fine wrinkles.
Moisture That Absorbs Quickly I love how my skin drinks this in. I wish it was fragrance free, however. I would have given it 5 stars if it had less of a scent. I would buy it again.
Amazing Fragrance I have tried many different types of moisturizers, but this product does a great job for me! Thanks Regeneration Oil of Olay

Does The Job! I tried this moisturizer and was pleased. It did moisturize my skin well. I live in a cold northern climate and am affected greatly during the long winters. I have been using this after my morning shower and it maintains wonderfully throughout the day. I can't say that I have noticed any change in firmness.

Great Moisturizer! I am really enjoying this moisturizer. I have fairly dry skin, especially during the winter months. This blended right into my skin nicely. It feels to me like a thicker consistancy. Some moiturizers are so light or thin that it feels like you need to re-apply it more than once to do the job.
What A Difference This product made my face look and feel like a I was still in my 20's.
Great Stuff!!! I love it!!! It dosen't leave my skin really shiny after I apply it.
Love It! I saw a noticable difference in my skin within a week!
Noticible Difference In Fine Lines And Wrinkles. This product definatly helped with fine lines and wrinkles. Would be my favorite if it also helped with dark spots.

Moisture Miracle This product worked great! I have extremely dry skin and this product made all the flakes and fine lines disappear. I have been looking for a good moistureizer and with Rivitalift I found one that makes my skin appear soft and younger.
Deep Acting Moisturizer So far so good. I've been using this for a few days now and it seems to be a keeper. Not sure that it is getting rid of lines, but my skin seems a little smoother.

Great for sensitive skin I'm very pale and have somewhat irritable skin, so I am pleased that this moisturizer is so light and easy on my face. Great hydration. It's a bit thicker than some products, so it will take longer to absorb fully. The package technology is actually really cool. You push the whole top of the jar down, and a little bit of the cream comes up. It works something like a push-pop. You get just the right amount, and when you get to the last of it, all of the cream is pushed out so that there isn't any wasted being stuck inside the jar. Love that.

Softest Skin! I have been using this product for about a week and a half and have already noticed a difference. Other products have burned or irritated my skin, but this one does not. When I wake my skin still feels soft and smooth, my pores seem smaller and my makeup goes on smoother. The only complaint would be the scent, it smells good, but a little too strong for the face area.
It Works I love Loreal products and use them all the time. This cream had a different smell to it, but went away quickly. I really liked the feel of it after applying it to my face and neck.
Nice Moisturizer I enjoyed the smell
What Wrinkles?! Thanks for the samples. I loved how it made my skin feel and the fragrance was wonderful. I would certainly buy this product.

I'll Be Making The Switch I was using another well known brand of moisurizer,but I will be switching! I love the way Revitalift makes my skin feel and look,with such little effort. I use it all over my face,even on and around the eyes.My former routine was 3 different products just for moisturizing. Revitalift is now my day and night moisturizer.In just a few days I saw wrinkles diminishing,my skin grew firmer and softer. It is not heavy,and soaks into my skin,leaving a younger,fresher,smoother feel. Nice scent

Very Moisturizing I was hoping for a tightening in the jaw line but did not see that but I only used this product for 5 days. I did see a difference in the moisure in my face and the softness. I feel the 5 days may not be enough time to judge fairly as far as wrinkle improvement.

So Far, So Good Have just finished trying a sample of this product and I am pleased with it. It seems to hydrate nicely and I intend to buy a full size and see how using it long term affects my skin, at which point I may increase the number of stars I award to it.
"Skin Feels Great!!" I was fortunate enough to obtain a weeks worth of samples of the RevitaLift. My skin absorbed it easily, and my skin, after a week was noticeably softer and more even toned.
Trying To Look More Youthful! I received my samples in the mail and since using them have noticed an improvement in my skin.Such a wonderful scent and makes my face feel so good.

Great Moisture All Day I received samples and tried them for the last week. Living in upstate New York in the winter moisturizer is a necessary staple. Loreal is not heavy, stickey or gummy like most. I can put this on in the morning and have soft, delicate skin all day. I have found my forever moisturizer . GOOD PRODUCT! THIS PRODUCT IS GREAT. MY SKIN IS DRAMATICALLY IMPROVED! IT LIVES UP TO ITS PROMISES. I Really Works I purchased the RevivaLivt Triple Power a week ago. I can already see softening of wrinkles and more firmness around my jaw line. I will use it to the bottom of the jaw. I love the way it feels on my skin.

Creamy, Smooth And Refreshing I simply love this moisturizer for night time use. I put it on after washing my face at the end of each day. The moisturizer goes on cream and smooth without a heavy, greasy feeling. It is absorbed quickly so you don't feel like it's being rubbed of onto your pillows at night. I didn't use it during the day because I use L'Oreal's Facial Day Lotion, but it can definitely be used because it is not heavy. I highly recommend this if you are looking for a light moisturizer that works. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Great Moisturizer Without The Oily Residue! So I have been using this moisturizer for a lil over a week. The scent is nice. The texture is light, but covers well without being watery or too thick. Day Cream With Spf I like the pump bottle that the lotion came in. I also was very pleased with the spf! I felt this had the right amount of coverage, and my face did not get greasy through the day. After 1 week of use my face is much smoother and looks healthy. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Seems Good So Far I like the feel of this moisturizer. Not oily or greasy, absorbs into the skin readily. Light fragrance. Can't really tell any difference in appearance of my 70 year old skin, but I do like the way it leaves my skin feeling. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Super Moisturizing And Pretty Packaging I have been using this moisturizer once a day, at night, before I go to bed. First, I use the Triple Power Concentrated Facial Serum Treatment and then I layer a dollop (about a pea-sized amount) of this moisturizer all over my face, concentrating around my eyes, where the skin is thinnest. If you have oily skin, you should probably skip the moisturizer or just put it under your eyes and around any dry areas. I put this over my entire face every day. For the cons, I would have preferred a pump dispenser. It seems a little messy to dip your finger into the jar, and I was never sure how much to use, exactly. It has a lightweight, floral scent that is pleasant and it absorbs quickly into the skin. I never got any breakouts, but then again, I'm in my 30s. The jar was very pretty on my counter. The colors of slate gray, red, and gold go together beautifully. The glass jar had some weight to it and felt expensive - no thin, plastic container here! I will continue to use this moisturizer every day, especially under my eyes. It is very thick and creamy, yet absorbs fast. So important to keep your under eye area hydrated to prevent those fine lines! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

L'oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Deep-acting Facial Moisturizer If I could describe this moisturizer in just one word it would be: luxurious. Immediately my dry skin was no longer flaky! After just one use! Not only did it help hydrate my skin and give it a nice smooth and soft texture, it smells great while doing it. The only thing I didn't like was it would sometimes get clump-like... Feeling the product ball up on my face. This review was collected as part of a promotion.
It is the best. I have tried many other products but Oil of Olay is the best. It is not oily or a heavy lotion my skin looks feels good.

The age defying element was noticeable temporarily, but seemed to wear off by days end or by morning. Love The Moisturizer After trying the moisturize for a few days...I'm loving how it keeps my skin moisturized. I generally have combination dry skin but this really kept the dryness at bay. The consistency is just right. It's not runny or to solid. It applies to the skin perfectly. I would consider switching moisturizers for this one. It's very light on the skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Moisture Rich I used the facial moisturizer twice a day following the serum treatment. The moisturizer seemed to provide long lasting protection throughout the day until the evening application was applied. This was a huge bonus considering I often reapplied my previous facial moisturizer several times a day. Upon application, the cream was a nice consistency, not too watery, not to thick, it was just right. The odor was pleasant and the product didn't leave my skin feeling oily or greasy. The reason I rated the product at 4 stars is due to a possible reaction to the product. I used this product in conjunction with the facial serum and after 3 days my skin started to become red and blotchy and received a stinging sensation upon application and lingering for about an hour or two. I can't tell which of the two products caused my reaction or if they were both at fault. I do have sensitive skin so it could very well have been both in my case. One thing is for sure, if you need deep moisturizing that lasts...this is your product. I was blessed to try this product for free through BzzAgent in return for leaving an honest review. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

This Stuff Works! I've been using this product for a little over a week now and for I'm loving it! After two days of use I noticed how soft and smooth my skin felt. Very Good Moisturizer L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer leaves my skin feeling fresh and smooth for the whole day! This is a great base for makeup. Super Moisturizer It did an excellent job of adding and trapping extra moisture into my skin. I applied it nightly for 6 days. I gave the product 4 stars because it did not have any impact on my thankfully, few wrinkles. I will continue to use the product to see if there will be other positive changes with long-term application. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Good As A Night Moisturizer A week ago I starting using the L'OREAL Deep-Acting Moisturizer as a night lotion. I think it is too greasy to use it during the day. It is perfect for night time though. I am 45 and my skin feels very smooth and looks well hydrated after using it. The scent is not unpleasant. I am also using it on my neck and decolletage. Pleasantly Surprised I've been using this for the past 2 weeks, replacing my old regiment. To start with, I have very sensitive, dry skin, with a long history of eczema (atopic dematitis) all over my body but worse of all on my face. Because of my history and knowing the vulnerabilities of my skin I first cleansed my face with a gentle cleanser, and PREPPED my skin with a layer of (no-fragrance/frills/sensitive skin) moisturizer before putting on top the Facial Serum Treatment and Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer. Normally I just use my sensitive skin moisturizer alone. Immediately, from day 1, I felt an overall plumpness, brightness improve on my face. What grabs you initially however is the strong, almost over-powering fragrance of both serum and moisturizer. Not that it smells bad or anything, but it is quite strong. Sometime over-powering even my perfume. That's why I give it 4 stars instead of 5. The product itself has been very effective for me. No irritation or itchiness despite my sensitive skin and the ability to keep my very dry skin moisturized throughout the day. I don't know how it would work for normal to oily type skin, but it has definitely gone beyond my expectations. I follow the regiment of Serum + Facial Moisturizer at least once a day. And although I have not noticed any significant improvements on my forehead wrinkles, the overall quality of my skin has improved to my surprise. Much more plump feeling and after initial application there is a notable brightness and clarity of my skin. I can't say that the brightness/plumpness lasts the entire span of the day, but it definitely does last for the hour or two immediately after application. Overall, I have been pleasantly surprised. Despite the strong fragrance, my very dry and sensitive skin has had no negative reactions, nor allergic flare-ups to the ingredients. I would definitely recommend and continue to use. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Okjkenda57 I am a bit older that maybe some and I thought why not try these products the L 'Oreal Paris Revitalift facial moisture and was pleasantly surprised I am kind of picky with these types of products as some leave your skin oily or they feel greasy - this product was neither of those things it felt light and creamy and did wonderfully in the dryer spots on my face --- I have used it for about 10 days and my face does look brighter and I love the end result fr I hope to continue to see progess , my face fells fuller and looks like it is glowing This review was collected as part of a promotion.

My Revitallift Experience Before I get a product I would want to know what it specifically does, what other user's reactions where to it, and if the company that produces it is known to deliver what is promised. Overall i'd say that had a good experience with L'Oreal RevitalLift. I tried the concentrated facial serum, the deep acting facial moisturizer and the facial day lotion SPF 20. I've been using them for about a week now and I really like the affect they've had on my skin. I had been looking for a product to soften my skin and make it look smoother and healthier and RevitaLift did just that. My face is very soft to the touch now and the products have a great fragrance to them. The only thing I didn't like is that my face is a little shiny. I'd be very interested to know what products are offered for people with oily skin. I have noticed this product before while shopping, but I thought it was a little too expensive. Quality Moisturizer. The RevitaLift deep-acting moisturizer has a thick consistency that absorbs into the skin, leaving it refreshed and moisturized. I have used this product alone and with the RevitaLift serum, and either way it feels heavy on my skin. I thought at first that it felt that way because it was used in combination with the serum, but even when I tried it alone, it felt like it sat on top of my skin for a long time. Once it's absorbed, the skin feels soft and refreshed, but if you need something that's quick, this might not work for your routine. Also, the first time I used this it was in my morning routine and after 3-5 minutes of letting it settle into my skin, I put my make-up primer on only to have it all roll off in little clumps on my fingers! I use an expensive primer that I use sparingly, so I don't feel it was the amount used, I think it's a bad combination of the gel-based primer and moisturizer together. Pros: The pros are that a little goes a LONG way. I used the moisturizer for 7 days and literally just used what was on the lid. It's a thick, creamy, lightly-scented moisturizer that I look forward to putting on my skin. Cons: The cons are that it takes a while to absorb into the skin - I've made this a part of my nightly skincare routine only because my mornings tend to be fast-paced. It doesn't mix well with my make-up primer, meaning its limited to when I am not going to wear make-up, but that's not a deal breaker for me. Overall, the product is as effective as some of the more expensive products I've tried and once absorbed into the skin, its effects are noticeable. My skin feels and looks refreshed. I Like This Facial Moisturizer I was thrilled to get a chance to try L'Oreal facial moisturizer as I already use many other products offered by them. I love this facial moisturizer. Great Hydration I was apprehensive to try the entire Revitalift line because I do have somewhat sensitive skin, but also because I'm very prone to clogged pores and blackheads. Once I find a routine that works for me, I tend to stick with it for a long time, and only experiment with one or two different items at a time. About my skin: I have combo skin that leans towards oily. However, because I use a prescription retinol lotion each night, my skin does get dry. And sometimes, it gets really dehydrated so I have flaking skin on my nose which is also oily - it's not cute. First application I noticed that there was a strong smell. I happen to really like the scent, it reminds me of a L'Oreal hair conditioner that I used to use. I will say that the scent lasted on my skin for quite some time, so if you're highly sensitive to fragrance or you just prefer unscented skin care products, this might not be for you. The moisturizer smooths over the skin and feels really pleasant when applied. I did note that this was a bit heavy for me, but that's most likely because I do have some issues with oil. I used it for some time at night, and once under makeup when my skin was being particularly troublesome, and I did wake up with smoother and softer skin that felt really hydrated. However, it did clog my pores up. I definitely didn't have an issue with breakouts and it wasn't huge, but I did notice some extra clogged pores and a slight increase in blackheads while using this product. Overall, this is a great night moisturizer, especially with winter weather coming. I will definitely continue to use on my neck and chest, and I'll use it on my face when it's extra dry. I also used this as an intensive hand treatment and I LOVED it for that. I think this would be best geared toward drier skin types, because it is a bit heavy for oily skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Rich And Creamy Moisturizer The L'Oral Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer felt very rich and creamy. Even though I applied a thin layer on my face it felt thick and heavy. The thickness and fragrance wouldn't be enough of a negative for me not to recommend it. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Triple Power Indeed! First impressions: *The packaging is attractive and sleek. It will look nice on my counter. * Opening the Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer, I took a sniff. It has a pleasant, clean scent First use: *I applied the Deep-Acting Moisturizer. It has a somewhat thick consistency , so not much product was needed to fully moisturize my face and neck. This is non-greasy despite its consistency. Absorbed quickly and left my face feeling soft. Now, a little background on my skin. For the past couple of months, I have been experiencing extreme facial dryness and flaking, which greatly accentuated my fine lines to the point they looked like full wrinkles. I looked like I had aged 10 years in two months, and I am not exaggerating. I asked trusted people to be honest with me, and that I would not be offended, and they agreed that I looked like I had aged rapidly. It totally ruined my confidence and made me not want to leave the house. I tried many different lotions, but most just irritated my skin or only worked very temporarily. With this in mind, you can understand why I was so excited to try L'Oreal Revitalift Triple Repair Deep-Acting Moisturizer. I have used it twice daily for a week now, in the morning after my shower and at night before bed. The results Great! I was not expecting too much because of my chronic skin dryness, but my skin looks and feels better than it has in months! I've already regained a lot of confidence and am not ashamed to l have people look at my face. I appreciate that the lotion is not irritating and not greasy. My face feels so much softer now that I can't stop touching it (uh oh, I heard that can cause acne!). I look forward to seeing even more results in the future and I would recommend this product to anyone who would like to improve their skin! (Apologies for the blurry photo!) This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Triple Power Healthy Skin I have a very pale complexion with extremely sensitive skin which leans towards the oily side. Finding products for my skin has been a difficult and expensive process. The cream is thick and smooth with quick absorption into the skin. I would apply the L'Oreals RevitaLift Triple Power Concentrated Facial Serum Treatment before applying the moisturizer. After using the both products together for just a few days I noticed that my skin felt drastically smoother and softer to the touch. I am usually prone to break-outs when using new products, but this product did not cause any problems. In addition, there was a more even tone to my skin with a healthy glow that I didnt expect. The only downside is that it has a very strong fragrance (especially if you have allergies or are highly sensitivity to fragrances). Overall, I would say this is a great product if you want to replenish, revitalize and keep skin looking healthy! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Harmful UVA/UVB rays. I cleanse my face and neck each night and apply a generous amount of L'oreal Paris Triple Power DEEP-ACTING MOISTURIZER. Applying a generous amount absorbs 100 into my skin. Making me feel like my skin will stay hydrated, nourished and stay healthy without me feeling like I'm wearing a mask. L'orealParis Triple Power DEEP-ACTING MOISTURIZER is another, I'M SO WORTH IT products that I can recommend this product to women of all ages and skin types. LOVE L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer! L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer is a god-send! I LOVE this moisturizer! I have used it for the past 3 weeks every night as my last facial product. I am a 3xs a week Retin-A user (for anti-aging) and my skin really needs a lot of moisture to balance out the drying effects of Retin-A. I like to use products that are a little heavier at night because my skin soaks them up throughout the night pretty well. Sometimes I feel like I need to use a moisturizer first thing in the morning as well because my skin usually feels pretty dry. I used L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer on my face, neck and decollete. Sometimes I would treat my hands too. When using L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer at night, my skin was surprisigly still pretty fabulously moisturized in the morning (versus other products I have tried). It is easily absorbed by my face without leaving any greasy traces. I love the light, fresh, floral scent too. The added bonus is the anti-aging ingredients that are added to this moisturizer: Pro-Xylane and Hyaluronic Acid. Together, these ingredients help my skin to be more radiant in the morning and nice and soft- a big win win in my book, especially since I am combatting dry Retin-A skin all the time! I felt like my skin looked more rested and therefore, more youthful. I did not use this moisturizer in my morning routine, but after these great nighttime results, I am going to try it out. The only thing I would change would be the packaging. The jar is beautiful, however, I would really like it to come with a pump so the active ingredients are not exposed to the air and the amount used could be more controlled. Lastly, I would definitely recommend L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer to a friend and will most definitely be using it on myself in the future! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Extremely moisturizing, smooth and leaves skin silky soft. The biggest questions I had before I received these items were: What results should I expect and what is the timeline in which I should receive those results. The boxes are clearly labeled on the steps and order in which to use them and also the time frame of when to see results. I am highly impressed with all the information that I received, the results I am seeing and all of the compliments I am getting about my skin and it's been just over a week! The Deep Acting Facial Moisturizer is fragment free and doesn't leave any odor. It is absolutely amazing! Here's my skin story: I have extremely sensitive, dry and hard to moisturize skin. I usually have to reapply facial lotion at least 3 times a day to keep my skin from feeling tight or looking dry and if I had makeup on.. well there really wasn't much I could do. I was very skeptical because as many of you have probably done as well, I've tried everything from expensive to cheap lotions only to be left with no results and lost of money. L'Oral Deep Acting Moisturizer is the absolute best Lotion I have ever tried! It leaves my skin soft and smooth without being greasy or shiny. I've also noticed when I apply foundation it doesn't crease around my eyes or get caked up and stays on longer and looks freshly put on throughout the whole day! I also use it with the Serum every night. It has been a little over a week since I have started using this product and I definitely notice that my skin is smoother, softer, more youthful looking and the wrinkles under my eyes are fading! This is in only 1 week! I can't wait to see how much better my skin feels and looks in a couple of weeks. I highly recommend this to people of all skin types(do a little test prior to applying to entire face just to be sure). I'm just starting to get wrinkles and I believe as I continue to use these L'Oral RevitaLift products they will continue to reduce the signs of aging. I am going to buy these sets as Christmas and birthday gifts for my loved ones and friends. I have recommend them to all of my friends, family and social media sites. Thank you Bzzagent and L'orealParis for allowing me to try these amazing items! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Horrible lotion! I am very fair and burn easily in the sun. I was excited to try this product after reading some reviews. I have tried this lotion several times, thinking I was applying it wrong or something. Everytime I use it, It leaves blotches, especially on my arms and chest no matter how much I tried to rub it in evenly. It also took too long to completely dry. If it is not completely dry, you will have lighter spots where your clothes rub your skin or where your arms bend and such. I just cannot stand still for 30 minutes to an hour for the lotion to dry, not touching anything! The color looked pretty orange. It also had a very bad smell after it was left on for a few hours. Also, it washes right off in the shower so don't even think about taking a bath with this because you will be bathing in orange water. The only thing I do like about the lotion is that it gives you color right away and becomes darker over time, but it'd be better if the color wasn't orange. I absolutely HATE this product and I do not recommend it to anyone, especially fair skinned people.

I got home and read the directions twice before I applied it. I started from bottom to top of my body and got my husband to help with my back just to insure no streaks. As soon as I put it on I was getting the color. And the smell wasn't bad at all. It says to dry completely before you put your clothes back on and to wait 2-3 hours before you get your final color. The 3rd hour came and gone and I could barely tell any difference at all. So I decided to sleep with it on. Got up the next morning and took a shower. The water was Orange and it was so greasy. Took forever for that part to go away. When I got out I looked at my toes and streaks everywhere! I rubbed it off with the towel thinking Itwouldn't come off and I was about to be stuck with orange streaked toes. It came right off. I looked it the mirror to see what my body looked like and OMG orange and streaks all over!!!!! If I could put a pic. on here and show you I would. white spots everywhere. I would not use this again and would not want my friends to look like this.

Excellent Moisturizer As in my other reviews, I should start off by telling you my skin type, I think that is very important in understanding if my review will be helpful to you. I have fair skin but tan very easily, more oily than dry and have occasional breakouts and am in my mid-30's. Using a heavy moisturizer has always been a terrible adjustment for my skin because of the oily sensitive nature of it. But I wanted to give this moisturizer a fair chance. It was very thick compared to what I normally use and comes in a jar (which is convenient for getting every last drop of the product). I was amazed for how thick this was (it is definitely more a cream than a lotion), that it blended in quickly to my skin and the only thing that was left was soft skin. There is no oily residue or even any trace that I put it on (except for the softness of course). The scent is the same as the other produces in the Triple Power line, pleasant and not overpowering. I use this in the pm and the first few mornings I woke up with more than normal oily skin. That was expected because my body needs a chance to get used to the chance and to figure out it's oil balance...the more moisture your skin gets the less oil it needs to produce so when you start using a cream or lotion your body will learn to produce less overtime. Now I have no problem and my skin is very soft and visually looking better. And no breakouts! Yay! Its been several weeks since I've started using this and 2 other L'Oreal products in the RevitalLift Triple Power line (Concentrated Facial Serum and the Day lotion moisturizer SPF 20 which I have also reviewed) and absolutely love all three. I would definitely recommend this and the other products in this line! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Love that added sunscreen! I just started using L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Facial Moisturizer last week. I am 36, and I am just starting to see some fine lines around my eyes. I can't speak to whether it improves fine lines or wrinkles yet, because I have only been using it for about a week now. But I'll tell you about what I've noticed about the product so far. Pros: -It goes on light and absorbs well into my skin. I hate heavy, greasy products. This is not greasy or thick. -It has added SPF 30 sunscreen. This is SO important in a daily moisturizer, and definitely will help prevent wrinkles. -I had some acne spots on my face when I started using this product. I did not have any additional breakouts as a result of using this product. -Although the 1.7 oz bottle seems small, you only need a very small amount to cover your whole face. I think this one bottle would last me a couple months. -The packaging is very cute! I love the deep red and purple colors. Cons: -The L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power system involves using at least three different products. It can be expensive to buy all three products, and it's a bit of a hassle to use all three over the course of a day. If you like using multiple products, it's not a big deal, but for me, I think I'd prefer a more simple routine. -It is a scented product, which may not be appropriate for sensitive skin. The scent is nice, though--a light, clean scent, and it is less overpowering than some other products I have tried. Overall: I liked this product a lot. I think it worked well for my skin, and I would recommend it to others. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

Silky smooth This L'Oreal Triple Power Deep Acting Day/Night Moisturizer with hyaluronic acid is awesome! It's thick and rich, a very creamy moisturizer that brings to mind deep-penetrating body creams. It goes on smoothly right after using the L'Oreal serum, and feels silky and luxurious. It absorbs quickly, and I wait a few minutes before putting on foundation, but makeup goes on wonderfully with no,clumping or smearing after the morning use. I put it on before bed as well, after cleaning the old makeup off of my face. By morning my skin looks plump and refreshed. Used as a system with other L'Oreal products, so far I've had excellent results. My wrinkles are diminishing and my skin looks far more clear. This formula may also work well for those with sensitive skin, as I normally break out from many products, but have not had a single issue with this L'Oreal line. My one suggestion for improvement would be to put an interior thin plastic lid on the cream under the twist-off lid. My cream was delivered upside down, and all the cream had pooled into the top of the twist off lid, making for a bit of a challenge getting it back into the container. It also appeared to only be about half fullL'Oreal might want to consider filling the container more completely. Otherwise, this product has been perfect and I'm looking forward to seeing results at the end of 8 weeks or so. I've also been finishing up,with L'Oreal Triple Power facial Day lotion with SPF 20, so my review on that will be coming up, but so fat that is great as well.
